Reviews.Title: “Great staff”
Reviews.Author: steveclarke35
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed one night 10th Sept the 2 young girls on reception in the afternoon/ evening where great plenty of help and smiles even ringing the room after check in to see if everything was OK. Breakfast was good and the view from the room stunning. 2 downsides, the towels for the pool very very thin and not having cushions on the sun beds didn't help and the very noisy air con in the room but I have to say the attitude of the staff was more than enough to make up for these couple of things. As some others have said a little tucked away but nothing a short taxi ride can't fix! I stay at IHC all the time and am a platinum member which was fully recognised at his hotel, thanks and well done everyone.

Reviews.Title: “We will definitely return”
Reviews.Author: JoOcala
Reviews.Content: Check in procedures were swift and efficient with a very friendly rep and we so appreciated the upgrade! Our room was ready and waiting for us and we were delighted to be on the top floor with a panoramic view of the ocean and pool. Our room was spacious and very clean. Comfortable beds and our little kitchenette was thoughtfully stocked w/well thought through items. We loved the outdoor dining available which overlooks the pool area and just beyond, the ocean. It's so nice to have a really really clean, updated, spacious hotel room! This Holiday Inn truly is doing it right.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, View, Pool”
Reviews.Author: Canesfan16
Reviews.Content: Updated rooms and property, very nice pool area with fire pits and a hot tub. Directly on the beach for easy access. Disappointed in the # of rooms available with a King bed, and service at the bar and restaurant was poor. Staff was friendly and helpful, parking can be a bit tough but we managed to find a spot every day. A little bit south of all the main action, but easily accessible with a short drive or bike ride.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful vacation and Hotel !”
Reviews.Author: KyGin
Reviews.Content: Our vacation at this hotel was great! We went with friends and stayed for a week. What a relaxing and stress free vacation. The hotel was clean and updated (the beds were more comfortable than ours at home!) and the staff took care of whatever we needed. The pool, fire pits and outdoor dining were a plus for us. The one complaint I had was that the lady bartender wasn't very nice....I'm hoping she was just having a bad couple of days and that she isn't always like that! I forgot to pack my dolphin anklet and when I called about it, they said they had found it and mailed it to me immediately. Thank you! We will definitely be returning to this hotel in the future. There is not enough space here to tell you how nice our experience was at this hotel in Daytona Beach! You'll just have to go and find out for yourself!

Reviews.Title: “Great location & Staff”
Reviews.Author: VADizFan
Reviews.Content: As a stopover on our way to Disney, we decided to do a night on the beach...Daytona Beach. I found a reasonable rate...read a lot of reviews...and kept my fingers crossed. You can never tell with beach hotels...some places just don't keep them up. We arrived very late (after midnight) and the front desk staff called me by name - he was waiting for us! We were given an oceanfront room on the 4th floor - parking is in a garage but the spaces aren't tight - so it's good. Our room had a separate bedroom 'cubby' for the kids with bunk beds, desk, television. The beds have their own push on/off lights. The bedroom was a good size - and the balcony was great. Very nice bathroom. Plus everything was super clean! Because we arrived so late, everyone was tired and wanted to sleep in. A call down to the desk got us a late check out (2pm). Excellent!! We went out on the beach to explore and enjoy. Then jumped in the pool. Finally, we ate at the restaurant for a late breakfast. The food was surprisingly tasty - and priced reasonably...especially since kids meals were free! You also get two free drink coupons upon arrival - which we used for our beverages in the morning (coffee/tea/soda). For those that drink, they could be used for alcohol as well. We really enjoyed everything. The hall/bath is tile...the living area is carpeted. The balcony has really nice furniture, too.

Reviews.Title: “Best Value and Service BY FAR!”
Reviews.Author: beccadowling
Reviews.Content: We booked an ocean view room on priceline for $65 per night, and it was the best 80 bucks (with tax) I've spent in a while! The rooms are very nice and clean, with granite countertops and flat screen tvs. The patio was quiet with a fair view of the Atlantic. We slept really well! The customer service was wonderful! Jose, our server and bartender at the beachfront restaurant downstairs was an absolute delight! He treated my 2 year old daughter like a princess, and went out of his way to provide us with more than anything we requested. Becky was very helpful as well. Also, the front desk was extremely helpful, specifically Ekta, who signed us up for the Holiday Inn Rewards, and we got a free 2 pm late checkout! Also, the pool area is awesome if you have children! There is a large kiddie splash area where I was able to lay out and relax while my daughter played safely and blissfully in the shallow pool with huge waterfalls! The beach is really quite beautiful, and there is a chair and umbrella rental about 10 feel from the hotel! All in all, this hotel is impeccably run, and I will stay there every time we visit. Book this, you will LOVE it!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and unbeatable location”
Reviews.Author: lakwatchera11
Reviews.Content: Hotel rooms are modern and clean, nice sheets, soft fluffy pillows. Beach towels are stringy, scratchy and really small though. Upon checkin you get vouchers for complimentary drinks, Bartender lady NOT friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Modern, clean and ON the beach!”
Reviews.Author: Leah E
Reviews.Content: I was so pleasantly surprised by this hotel. It is modern and updated and so clean. Especially for being directly on the beach. The staff was so friendly and helpful and the rooms were gorgeous and comfortable. I would definitely recommend this hotel again. The pools (full and kiddie) were perfectly clean and the jacuzzi was great too. The fire pits outside were a nice touch as well. It was so nice to sit at the restaurant outside and just listen to the live music and relax. It's close enough to all the restaurants and bars to be a short drive but far enough that it's quiet at night.

Reviews.Title: “"I'm Glad We Came"”
Reviews.Author: toomuchtravel
Reviews.Content: This Holiday Inn Resort provided everything I expected and more! This is true from the great, "straight-on" view from the balconies actually facing the ocean (not at an angle) to guest services to the pool to cleanliness to the dining experiences. Our family of four spent 3 nights here in mid-August. There was a certain amount of nostalgia with this stay - growing up, our family always stayed at roadside Holiday Inns, typically 2-story, exterior room access, and large pools. When my boys (12 and 9) saw the pool, they said, "wow, it's 10 feet deep!" I explained how hotel pools were in the good ole days! This pool is very large and welcoming. The colorful lights after dark add another element of fun. The hot tub was actually hot and the fire pits added a nice touch. We reserved a Kid's Suite, which had 2 beds and a little nook with a bunk bed for the kids. The nook also had its own lights for each bunk, overhead light and tv. The balcony provided some extra space for sitting and admiring sunrises, waves, beach, starry nights, and evening lightning over the ocean. The room appeared modern and everything was clean and in good working order. There was also a small fridge and small microwave. Wireless Internet worked fine. Beach access was just a few steps down from the pool area. I don't typically eat a lot of meals in hotel restaurants, but the convenience of eating immediately after burning up energy at the beach and pool made it to enticing to not give it a try. I'm glad we did! We didn't eat every meal there (see also reviews soon for Aunt Catfish's restaurant, Medieval Times, and Stavros Pizza), but the breakfasts, lunches, and dinners we did eat were great! The food was tasty and delivered with wonderful service from people like Jose. He is there to truly serve the guests and help them have a great dining experience and stay. Becky, at the front desk, is amazing! She greeted me with a warm smile when I checked in and then somehow remembered my name and face everytime I needed assistance or had a question. I travel a lot for business, spending over 100 nights a year in hotels - Becky truly stands out as a role model for guest services (DJ and others were great also, I just happened to have most contact with Becky). All in all, this was a great stay at a great beachfront hotel. I personally liked that it was a little bit away from the busiest, more crowded areas of the beach and town. I highly recommend it to others and will definitely make it my first choice if I return to Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful view, great pool, average room”
Reviews.Author: Tisha399
Reviews.Content: Pluses: We had a wonderful balcony and ocean view, kids loved the pool and beach. Location is convenient to shops and restaurants and there is a pool bar and restaurant. Minuses: Had to ask for extra towels twice before they arrived, you have to "check out" pool towels and return before getting new ones, the AC unit blows directly on the person (me) sleeping in one of the beds. The AC unit is only a few inches from the face. If you are a person who sweats at night you would love freezing air blowing in your ears, up your nose, etc. but I didn't like it. As soon as you turn up temp one degree, it goes off and you sweat so I stayed up all night switching it. Bring a sound machine if you are noise sensitive.

Reviews.Title: “Never wanted to leave !!”
Reviews.Author: timstallings
Reviews.Content: We arrived earlier than planned the front desk was so accommodating getting us in our room without delay. Our room was clean timely and thoroughly daily, hats off to the housekeeping staff and management. We normally dont eat breakfast in the hotels but my wife and I were pleasantly surprised by the service and food. As our week progressed when we passed the staff in the hallways everyone spoke with a hello, or a thank you for staying with us. There is a nice game room my children enjoyed on a nightly basis , and an activity center great for kids during the day to take a break from the sun. An absolute MUST is the fire pits ( great idea Holiday Inn ) at dusk they light the pits and there are a few chairs by both pits and the heat mixed with the cool air off the ocean is amazing great for couples in the evening. Without a doubt will return to the Holiday Inn Resort Daytona, and strongly recommend especially families with children.

Reviews.Title: “Great value fanatastic views”
Reviews.Author: termnalvee
Reviews.Content: Arrived late at night and was pleasantly greeted by a very efficient front desk staff. Room was very clean with the exception of hair in the bathtub. View of ocean and pool from room was outstanding. Good a/c. Comfortable beds.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to spend the night”
Reviews.Author: snelson1112
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for convenience and received much more. We just got off a cruise and we were flying out of Daytona. So we thought we would stay at an ocean hotel for our last vacation night. What a nice treat. Check in was quick and easy. We showed up a little early on 7/23 and we were given a room so we could go enjoy the beach. We parked in a garage, which is very nice in the Fl heat. The room was very clean and updated. The beds were comfy. Loved the way the firm and soft pillows are labeled. Nice to have a frig in the beach front room. The bathroom is roomy and very clean, water pressure was good. I think all the rooms are oceanfront which is a plus. Our room was over the parking lot, but we were up high enough that it did not bother me. I still had a great ocean view. The pool area is very nice. My kids loved the pool as well as a ocean. Kids were able to run around the hotel unsupervised. This became annoying when every time we got in the elevator, all the floor numbers were pushed. So we had to stop at every floor when we rode the elevator. We were one of the top floors, so we stopped a LOT. Parents really need to watch their kids. We ate dinner at the hotel. It was just OK. The waitress was very nice. Something happened to their soda machine and they did not have sodas to offer. It was fixed mid meal and she brought my kids soda and swapped out the lemonade that they did not like. The meals were average at best and a bit overpriced. I guess you are paying for the convenience. The business center is 2 computers located in the lobby, right at the entrance door. We had to advance check in for our flight the next day right there in the lobby. Not very private. We had to print off our boarding passes at the front desk. The girls were helpful with getting that done. It was not crowded when we came so there were no issues finding chairs poolside or a parking spot. But this is a pretty big hotel. I could see where there may be a problem when the hotel is booked. Wish there was a free continental breakfast. Overall this is a really nice hotel at a great beach. The rooms are great with fabulous views.

Reviews.Title: “An amazing vacation!”
Reviews.Author: Bev W
Reviews.Content: First, I would like to give Kudos to DJ and Rolando. They both were warm, caring yet very professional. I appreciated DJ's warm greeting when we registered. Our room was perfect, couldn't get any better!!! The older lady on the morning shift (supervisor) (Monday 8/6/12) Didn't get her name. She was NOT nice at all. Very disappointing after such a wonderful and amazing stay. The property far exceeded our expectations...!!!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Enviroment!”
Reviews.Author: Dawn Y
Reviews.Content: Original plan visit Siesta Keys Beach for 8 days, with our family of 4 children. The home we rented & paid for turned out to be disgusting, as well as the beach~ definetly NOT as Described! We left that area as soon as we could. We were at the mercy of availability and rates. Long story, short- Eventually, we came to this Holiday Inn on the Daytona Beach. Although, we never intended to end up in Daytona & not all 6 of us in a hotel room! We were greeted by Nicole, who showed us the beautiful hotel & all it had to offer. We stayed 4 days, cramped into one suite, only because it was a newly remodeled hotel, wonderful pool, hot tub & camp fire, along with the views of the beach~what more could you ask for? I spoke in great length to Becky one evening. Staff made us feel very safe & comfortable, (well as comfortable as we could be). Point is...Although this vacation didn't go as planned, we made the best of the situation & felt welcomed by the staff. Thank you, I truly appreciated that. Only thing that would have made this better, would have been a better rate:)

Reviews.Title: “GREAT PLACE FOR THE FAMILY”
Reviews.Author: John R
Reviews.Content: The experience here was GREAT! Everyone was WONDERFUL! The service was EXCELLENT!. The room was perfect for my family and I. The oceanfront view from the room was AMAZING! The sunrise in the mornings were BEAUTIFUL! At night the pool lit up like a light show. The firepits by the pool had a romantic touch. The hotel has a restaurant on site, H2O Bar and Grill. Special thanks to Jose our server. He was EXCELLENT! Also want to give special thanks to the Activity Director Sheena SUPERB JOB with the arts and crafts, face painting and DJing on Sundays.

Reviews.Title: “Holiday Inn saved our vacation”
Reviews.Author: Dani S
Reviews.Content: We came in late on a Monday and was originally booked at another hotel. It was awful so we cruised down Atlantic trying to find another place to stay. We found this Holiday Inn, went in at about 1:00 in the morning and they gave us a great rate for the week. This place is wonderful. The staff is friendly, my husband and I especially liked Jose who works in the restaurant. We'd get up early while our teenage children were still sleeping, have our breakfast and socialize with Jose. Our view was amazing! The balconies are a good size and the beds are comfortable. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Nice and Relaxing”
Reviews.Author: Grobanlover
Reviews.Content: We are just completing a week stay at the Holiday Inn Daytona Beach Oceanfront. It is reasonable, clean, comfortable and the beach is amazing. The front desk attendants are quick and efficient. Sheena the activity director made activities fun and enjoyable. The kids loved her. Fun in the sun !!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for our family vacation!”
Reviews.Author: Barbara M
Reviews.Content: I rarely leave reviews, but our experience here was so wonderful I wanted to share! The ocean views are beautiful, the rooms are updated and clean. The service was excellent. Even when we had problems booking correctly through the national reservation line, the local front desk helped correct their confusion. The resort has an excellent location and the pool and fire pits on the beachfront are clean and relaxing and my kids had a blast in the baby area. We will be returning in the future!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “A good choice for a vacation in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: MaloPol912
Reviews.Content: This is definitely one of the better Holiday Inns. It was easy to find, directly on the beach as stated, and the rooms and bathrooms have obviously been renovated which resulted in a neat, clean, and comfortable space. I was surprised that room service was so affordable and easy to deal with, and the food was always good. Also, the Ocean Walk is literally a few stop lights down, and other eateries and shopping malls are just over the bridge- not even 15 minutes away. The staff was always hospitable, which is hard to find these days so that was greatly appreciated. We enjoyed our stay so much that we actually extended it the day we were suppose to originally leave, and thanks to Becky, we received a discount for already being in-house guests. The only 2 downfalls were the lack of television channels and the parking. It's like you're always competing with other guests to park on site (which there really isn't enough space for more than 1 vehicle to search for parking at a time) or you'll have to park across the street. Because the shop across the street is abandoned, everyone assumed it was safe to park there, until we asked an employee who told us that they didn't own that lot, but the one next door named Marcos. Luckily none of us were ticketed or towed. Despite this minor hiccup, I would most certainly stay here again. It's close enough to drive to the action but far enough to actually relax and enjoy your vacation. Oh, and Orlando is barely an hour away!

Reviews.Title: “Happy with our Choice”
Reviews.Author: Shawkir
Reviews.Content: Overall, we were very pleased with this hotel choice. There are definitely lower priced options in Daytona Beach, but this was our last night in Florida after leaving Disney and we wanted to make sure we had an nice, comfortable stay right on the beach - we got it! The room was exceptional with new paint, bedding and kitchen and bathroom fixtures. We arrived in the afternoon and spent time at the beach using the access through the pool area. The kids loved the pool, which has a small waterfall and I found the lounge chairs very comfortable and readily available. The pool restaurant/ bar also looks nice although we had just one drink and did not eat there since we had kitchen facilities and made our own dinner. There was live entertainment by the pool in the late afternoon. Once it got dark, the pool lights up in multi colours and there are two fire pits in the pool area. There is also a hot tub. Kiddie splash area is nice, clean, gated. Overall pleasant stay with beautiful ocean view from the lovely balcony. As always, I will be honest and present my minor negative observations as well. As other reviewers observed, I did find some mystery smudges on the walls (bug splats?) and noticed one large roach on the balcony at night. Only other issue is that we booked same day by phone while we were on the road and forgot to ask for the CAA/ AAA discount. The clerk was unable to adjust the rate to provide us with the extra 5% discount when we arrived. Otherwise - brilliant choice - overall good pick!

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay.”
Reviews.Author: jackandbunny
Reviews.Content: Clean and modern rooms. Friendly staff. Pool area nice... I spent alot of time on the balcony during my stay here. I love the view and sound of the ocean. So my only negative thing is the roaches on the balcony at night.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: OwenFamily
Reviews.Content: Friendly, helpful staff, at resption and in the restaurant. Reasonable choice and affordable breakfast. Great to be right on the beach. Was upgraded to a sea view room after showing my priority card and also recieved a complimentary late check out.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great time with family”
Reviews.Author: Singlept123
Reviews.Content: The thomas family would like to give Dawn and D.J. a shout out for a quick check in, and D.J was very helpful with direction to an all you can eat buffet. The kids enjoyed the pool with the color lighting up at time. We enjoy all the ammenties playing bingo, beach volleyball. We really enjoyed out stay and will be back again. We were there from July 27-29. The only thing we did not like was the parking, but that not the hotel fork. Also the fire pit at night is great to sit by when the wind is blowing from the ocean. Loved everything.

Reviews.Title: “Great relaxing time!”
Reviews.Author: Goateeze
Reviews.Content: The hotel is all remodeled! It was very clean. Jose was our waiter at breakfast and he was great! The restaurant there serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. The food was good and reasonably priced. The jacuzzi was nice and hot! We enjoyed our stay and he to go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Great service but parking is real bad”
Reviews.Author: willit30
Reviews.Content: My family stayed for 7 days at this location July 16th to 22nd. The staff went above and beyond to ensure our confort and safety. The parking is the only real issue here - all the renovations make for a great experience, but the parking is engineered for much smaller vehicles than standard. Parking available across the street, but its a walk across lanes of traffic. Take into consideration a few careless parkers, and you need a can opener to get in your car. Overall, well worth the trip... great beach access and pool sanitation as well. If changes could be made, revamp the parking and ventilate the elevators a touch. Otherwise, a 4 out of 5!

Reviews.Title: “Clean but...”
Reviews.Author: kskifsta
Reviews.Content: Pricey but worth it...the hotel is a 40 year old building that was redone and modernized, rooms were really modern and extremely comfortable, pool area was extremely clean and upscale, beach views and parking access can't be beat. But the rooms had some cleanliness issues such as fingerprints on sliding door and mystery spills and splats on the doors n furniture.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Stay”
Reviews.Author: Lucy I
Reviews.Content: this was our last stop from a week trip. When we check in Dawn in the front was so pleasant to talk with. We were traveling with two young kids and gave us a room on the second floor with easy access to our car. hotel rooms: wow very clean and nice. looks like it was recently remodeled. the view from our balcony was beautiful. the beds were so comfortably.plenty of space in the room.very impressive for a Holiday Inn. Pool area- beautiful pool area that at night lights up different colors, there is splash area for the little ones to play in. the only down fall was there was NO Shade and it was hot. it would be nice if there was umbrellas so that we could have had shade especially for the little ones. The beach access was great foot steps from the hotel. it would have been nice to have breakfast included in the stay. I would definitely come back to visit again.

Reviews.Title: “ocean view”
Reviews.Author: Sswu
Reviews.Content: This is the last top of our 9 days trip. The front desk was welcoming. The unit and lobby are new and nice. The hallway doesn't look nice. The pool is nice and light well at night. It is not far from Jet ski rental place, which open at 9:30am. The location of Holida Inn is kind of far from most exciting area (near the Pier). But the stay is pleasent and unit is conformable and clean. I took a lot of picture of sun raise from my room/balcony. Beach sand is much nicer than cocoa beach. But we drive to attractions a lot more. It has nice kitchen with regular fridge, microwave, 2 burners, sink, and coffee machine. If we stay longer, I am sure I would feel more delighted. unfortunately we stayed two nights only. You could try hotel's own restaraunt. I like one of the sauce that made of pineapple, mango and other stuff. I never have that in other restaraunt. I love it. There were two fire pits next to the pool. It's great for night swim. It's warm in the water. Come out became quite chilly because of the wind.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: robert G
Reviews.Content: Thanks to all on TripAdvisor that recommended this hotel. Great staff, big clean room. Stayed on 7th Floor, ocean front balcony. A little further south on A1A of the main section which made it quieter. Will return.

Reviews.Title: “Great place”
Reviews.Author: MistiLondon
Reviews.Content: Myself and 2 friends stayed here for two nights on Priority Club points. The check-in was easy and we were upgraded to an ocean view suite which was great. The room was comfortable and the air conditioning worked very well...although it was a bit noisy at night. The suite comes with a full size fridge, 2 induction hobs, small sink, coffee maker and suitable glasses, plates, cutlery, pans etc. The hotel was very clean and of a good standard. The best bit was the view. Waking up to watch the sunrise over the ocean and dolphins playing in the sea was a great start to the trip! Coming from the UK the idea of driving on the beach is an intriguing one - the beach by the hotel is part that you can drive on, basically this means you have to sit in the surf to not be in the roadway. You need to check for (slow moving) cars at all times and the sand is sooooooooo hard that it's uncomfortable to sit in. However there are plenty of car free parts of the beach so it's fine :-) We had a car and I would definitely recommend going to the Cracked Egg Diner for breakfast, Ponce Inlet for the lighthouse and two amazing waterfront restaurants, and into the town for some antique shopping. Driving along some of the scenic routes is also great.

Reviews.Title: “Great for families”
Reviews.Author: timstallings
Reviews.Content: As a Priority Club member ( platinum ) I stay at several Holiday Inns throughout the year, and generally choose to stay in Florida for vacations. This location sets the standards and exceeds them. The customer service form the front desk to housekeeping , the resturant staff and even the guys cleaning the pool deck in the morning. Every employee we past by all said " good morning " or " I hope your enjoying your stay." the hotel was extremely clean and well maintained. Easy and quick access to the ocean. Daily activities for the children when they need a break from the sun. Overall great place and will return next time in Daytona. A special thank you to Jessica @ the front desk. As I checked in I inquired about local restaurants and she informed me that she just recently moved to the area. Instead of the " I new in town and ain't got a clue " she took the time to tell me what she's heard from other guest and confirmed info. with her coworker. So on a personal level ... Thank you Jessica and continue the great service.

Reviews.Title: “Great weekend”
Reviews.Author: waynes34
Reviews.Content: The hotel was exactly as expected. The staff were curtious and very helpful. The hotel was busy, but very clean, especially for an ocean front hotel. All our needs were met. The fire pits on the pool deck were a great feature at night. We can't wait to stay here again. The only negative was the fact that the pool bar H2O shut down early on a Sunday evening.

Reviews.Title: “Will Probably Go Back to Previous Hotel”
Reviews.Author: kelcoup
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't say I was disappointed, but we will be going back to our previous hotel. Here were our thoughts: The Good: Aesthetics. The hotel and grounds were nice and very well kept. Room design and furniture were very nice. H20's food was delicious. All hotel staff were very friendly. Plenty of lounge chairs by the pool. Plenty of vendors on the beach (if you like that). It's nice to have a separate pool area for the little kids. Plenty of activities to keep older kids busy. Close to local attractions. Live music on Friday and Saturday. The singer we saw was great. A family member was coming to visit for the day but decided she wanted to stay the night with us. We wanted to be honest, so we let the front desk know and expected them to charge us for her to stay in our room, but they were very nice about it and just let her stay with us. Upon check in, we were given the option of having a room at a higher or lower level. We were able to choose higher, which was nice. The Negative: We booked through hotels.com. The Holiday Inn was offering a better rate with more amenities than the hotel we usually stay at. Seemed easy enough and read all of the fine print. However, after checkout, our credit card was charged an additional amount. We called just to verify everything and it turns out there is a $6/day "resort fee"...which we were unaware of. Seems a bit silly as I thought that's what we had already payed for...So with the resort fee and no free breakfast, our previous hotel is actually less expensive. The beach was too crowded for our personal taste. But again, that is personal preference. Same for vendors. While convenient, we prefer to be farther down the beach where it is quieter. Beach traffic. We have a little one who likes to run so keeping him out of traffic was a challenge. We noticed other families having the same issue. Our room was on the far left and had a view of the Economy Inn's pool. That was not the problem. The problem was the Economy Inn's guests being very loud at 10:30-11ish in the p.m. We like to sleep with the door open to hear the ocean but had to close because we couldn't sleep. The hotel offers complimentary drinks upon arrival. We were given a ticket to take to the hotel bar. As we had just gotten in that evening from a long day of traveling, we decided to eat at the restaurant in-house. I had a $25 coupon for the restaurant that I had from restaurants.com. We ordered our drinks and presented the waitress with the ticket. Then ordered our food, keeping in mind that we had a $25 cushion. As we presented her with our coupon with the bill she let's us know that she can't accept it because we can't use 2 coupons in one sitting. I explained this was the only coupon we had to give. She then tells us that our COMPLIMENTARY drinks qualified as the second coupon. I then asked if we could just take off the drink ticket then and use that at a later time since we had upped our food orders with the restaurants.com coupon in mind. She came back about 5 minutes later and said that she couldn't and that she was "sorry." That left a bad taste in our mouth after an exhausting day. Not the best first impression of our new hotel. Please not that the waitress was not rude to us, it was just not good customer/hotel service for that situation. We found it best to enjoy the pool in the morning because by the afternoon it was full. The baby pool area was nice, but the dump bucket in the shallowest part was a bit nerve-wracking for fear of it drenching and knocking down our 17 month old. That was our take. I would never tell anyone not to stay here. In fact, I would recommend it to most. But for our family's preference, it wasn't quite what we were looking for. But we don't regret it and still had a great vacation (and left right before Debby!).

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: kah1022
Reviews.Content: This was our 2nd stay at this hotel and once again we loved it. We absolutely LOVE the pool area and the outside dining area to relax at night. The rooms are average rooms but clean and nicely decorated. Some of the items that might bother people, but have not really bothered us because we are really interested in a nice pool area, (a) the elevators are slow, (b) parking is tight and not always available late at night, and (c) the service at the bar is not always fast or even there. Overall though the hotel is a great stay and the employees are very nice and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Great room decor, wifi/parking included in $6/daily resort fee”
Reviews.Author: thenay84
Reviews.Content: Hotel adjacent to the beach, 1 mile south of the main boardwalk in Daytona Beach. The rooms are updated and clean. Wifi and parking is included in the $6/day resort fee. All rooms have an oceanview. Would stay here again! Friendly staff are a big plus too! Thanks for the 2 free drinks at check-in and 2pm late checkout with points card!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Suz78
Reviews.Content: Very clean, great location, comfortable beds but the most UNCOMFORTABLE chairs by the pool I have ever seen. These chairs were very dark in color so they were extremely hot and they would kill you to lay in them. The staff was extremely nice and I would recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful view, right on the ocean.”
Reviews.Author: lateforit
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night after a week at Walt Disney World. Our kids had never been to the ocean so we wanted to stay somewhere on the ocean. The room was very clean and the beds were comfortable. It was also nice that there was a full size refrigerator, microwave and sink available. (A must have when travelling with kids) The balcony overlooked the pool and the ocean. The pool area was quite large with lots of lounge chairs and plenty of room to move around. The views from the balcony were breathtaking and so relaxing, I wish we could have stayed another night. The only issue we had was that the parking was kind of tight, but other than that it was very good.

Reviews.Title: “The best time ever!!”
Reviews.Author: Mary Jane F
Reviews.Content: Rooms were clean. Beds were comfortable. The room had lots of amenities, to many to name all. We were on ocean front and it was beautiful! The sunrises were magnificent! The hotel has a spa that was very clean and relaxing. And they had fire pits to sit by at night. The pool was clean and very big. Becky at the front desk was very helpful and professional. The hotel would have activities everyday, the ones I enjoyed the most were, bingo, arts and crafts, scavenger hunt,and water arobics. Sheena the activity leader was very professional and very helpful and friendly. All the staff were right there if you needed anything. This vacation was the best I have had in a long while. Thanks to the Holiday Inn Resort Daytona, I had a great time. If I can make a suggestion please buy Sheena a CD for the water arobics, Thank you.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, right on the beach, doenst get much better than this.”
Reviews.Author: GeorgeM861
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel. All the staff members were very friendly.Service was fast and professional. The pool, bar and restaurant were great. Right on the beach, you can’t beat that. I would recommend the Ocean-Front rooms, the view is great, especially at sunrise. I did see the view from the non-ocean front side, and that's nice also. This hotel is in a good location, close to all the local fun stuff. I traveled alone on this trip, but this seems like a great place for families. I like that Daytona Beach is getting away from a Spring Break/Party Town type of place,to a more family-friendly, fun place to be. And I think this hotel exemplifies that.

Reviews.Title: “Doesn't get any better!!!!”
Reviews.Author: testatm
Reviews.Content: What a great place! The Front desk, the waiters and waitresses, were really nice!!! The room was nice! having the pool and ocean was great! Did Not See any Roaches or bugs!!! we would highly recommend this hotel!!!!! The Food was Good TO!!!!! Did not use the Spa. so i can't rate it.

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Justin M
Reviews.Content: Well for starters the staff was really nice. the rooms were clean. the location was good and the best part was it is right on the beach. the rooms with the view of the beach was really nice. this place also felt very secure.

Reviews.Title: “Great Mistake”
Reviews.Author: Thomas M
Reviews.Content: We came to Daytona Beach by mistake. My family and I were leaving Disney and going back to Nashville and got lost so we decided to stay one night at the beach. The front desk staff was so helpful and friendly that our one night became four days. The staff here is excellent. The activity director was the best and did some really great things with the kids. If I had to say anything negative it is that the rollaway bed is hard as a rock and not very comfortable , so if you think you might need one bring a blow-up.

Reviews.Title: “Would stay again :-)”
Reviews.Author: tennesseezip
Reviews.Content: We were very happy with this hotel. Front desk staff were very helpful and were able to accommodate an early check in for us. Our request for a high level, ocean front room was fulfilled and everything was very comfortable. We would recommend this hotel as a comfortable and clean, friendly place to stay. Wireless internet was a bit unstable but workable.

Reviews.Title: “Good overall, except for restaurant”
Reviews.Author: Greg50207
Reviews.Content: Great view, clean room, loved the free internet. Our only complaint was poor service at the restaurant, which had mediocre food. It was nice the kids ate free, and we got 2 complimentary drinks, but we experienced extremely slow service and mistakes in our order. An 18% gratuity is automatically added for all parties, which could eliminate any incentive to provide good service. Nice to see you read and reply to all the reviews posted here.

Reviews.Title: “ANTICIPATION............”
Reviews.Author: actressIndiana
Reviews.Content: I have experienced a wonderful time just by reading all of the fantastic reviews. I searched diligently to find the perfect resort for our upcoming 25th wedding anniversary. I want to make this a very special occasion. I chose Holiday Inn Resort based on all the excellent comments. I am extremely excited and will be there from July 29th - August 2nd 2012. I too spoke with Steve after booking through the 800 number. Steve enlightened me on a few questions I had regarding the King Oceanfront Hot Tub room that I've booked. I was elated to find out that this room is actually a suite!!! Hey Steve although you don't know, it is our anniversary celebration, and you made my day. I informed him that he better be there when we arrived because he was just so much fun to speak with!! I hope to have a memorable time in which my husband and I shall never forget. I have a good feeling that we will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “"This must be what heaven feels like"”
Reviews.Author: Annette D
Reviews.Content: Whether it's for a week long vacation or a theraputic getaway, The Holiday Inn Resort in Daytona Beach is the place to be. From the moment we checked in the friendly staff made us feel right at home. This was our second time in 2 months, and will be returning as much as we can. The rooms are beautifully updated with Flat Screen TV's and brand new bathrooms, very clean and comfortable. Enjoyed a Frozen Margarita pool side and a delicious lunch at the hotel restaurant. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone looking to stay in Daytona, you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Better Than I Anticipated”
Reviews.Author: 1NCfoodie
Reviews.Content: I booked this room for a long Memorial Day Weekend (4 nights) because there is not a Marriott on the water within the area(Marriott is my first choice and Holiday Inn is second). The hotel is an older property that has been refreshed. The pool area was nice and my wife and I really liked the "basket weave" style reclining lounge chairs...very comfortable--managed to read a very long novel in 3 1/2 days. Our 5th floor room was 2 doors down from the elevator on the 5th floor but we were never disturbed. The room was very clean, had 2 very comfortable beds, and the small kitchen served our purposes. The A/C kinda' shuttered at times and on the first night, woke me up...after that I got used to the noise. The staff was very friendly and appeared to take care of everyone very efficiently. Only real complaint was the elevator. It seemed to have a mind of its own and would skip floors, indicate you were going down and then go up....it was a roll of the dice and was noticed and commented on by several folks we saw. If I am in the area, I would stay at this resort, again. Parking could be a little bit of a challenge and getting away from the smokers at the pool was impossible.

Reviews.Title: “Family Friendly summer fun”
Reviews.Author: 911TechWV
Reviews.Content: I have the amazing luxury of staying at this property for a few months. This property offers kids activity center, a kid pool, a very wonderful pool with a depth of over 10 feet. A hot tub that is more than warm. Fridays and Saturdays they offer Live music pool side. Staff is always very friendly and enjoyable. Play some daily pool side bingo and then walk on to the beach for a hotdog!!

Reviews.Title: “GiGi57”
Reviews.Author: gigiw1954
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed a weekend at The Holiday Inn Resort Oceanfront, and it was an awesome stay. The view was amazing and the room was newly renovated with upscale furniture. I had dinner at the H2O downstairs and the staff and food was delicious. During the day I kind of chill by the pool and hot tub. The beach was located in the backyard of the hotel, yes that close. I can't wait for my next staycation.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely room & everything you need”
Reviews.Author: mackeinmexico
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights here. All rooms are ocean-front with nice balconies. Our room had a refrigerator & microwave, laundry facilities on our floor. The room was clean and well kept. Bedding was new and very nice. The front desk told us that a high school group was staying in the hotel, but we never heard any noise from them. Great pool and of course you are steps from the beach. Very nice......we would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Last Minute Trip”
Reviews.Author: Linda P
Reviews.Content: Had a last minute decision to go to Daytona, The Holiday Inn Oceanfront was great. The check in staff was great. Room was beautiful and facing the ocean. Exceptionally clean. Loved Daytona Beach cant wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to return!!!”
Reviews.Author: ZAZULibertyUtah
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at several beachfront hotels in Daytona Beach. This was one of the best we have encountered . Enjoyed the pool, fire pits in the evening, and the nice room. I always give a honest review, good or bad, the best thing I can say is I will stay there again. I want to thank the housekeeping staff for great service, I don't have her name but the young girl from Jamaica we want to thank for her smile and making our day. We were there for a graduation and were glad we chose the Holiday Inn this time in Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Good Memories”
Reviews.Author: Dianne G
Reviews.Content: We were on our way to Key West but needed a stopover for one day. Booked the Holiday Inn based on tripadviser reviews and certainly were not disappointed. Checking in was a bit of a challenge due to tight quarters out front of the hotel but this is really the only complaint. Rooms were clean, staff was pleasant and our memories of spring break had us pumped. Definitely a good spot. We booked our room for our return trip from Key West without hesitation. A little bit of a jaunt to the main street pier if you're walking on the beach. Very close to Ponce's Inlet if you are into lighthouses.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, beach views, look for lower rates during the week”
Reviews.Author: Chitownbigcityfan
Reviews.Content: Found on TA and was not disappointed. Asked for a higher floor (better views of the beach) was put on a middle floor but still had nice views. Parking was tight and we had to park across the street at a store that was closed. I would have liked to have parked on hotel property but it turned out fine. I saw on their website that the hotel was cheaper during the week. I called to extend my reservation and asked for the cheaper rate on the phone. They said I had it but then when I got there I did not. It took three trips to the front desk and finally a manager over rode the price on the extra nights so I did get the lower cost. One might want to make two reservations if they are staying on the weekend and then during the week to get the lower cost. Nice hotel with nice views. We would come back again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: NewYorkT
Reviews.Content: Found this hotel with the help of Trip Advisor, and was not disappointed. The room was a bit small, but totally fine. The pool was large and clean and there were lots of chairs available. The beach was also very clean. The restaurant was delightful for al fresco dining for breakfast, and nothing fancy but fine for the dinner we had, as well (The restaurants in Daytona Beach seem to be an issue in general--so why not eat here where the kids also eat free!) The cleaning staff on the 5th floor was wonderfully friendly and helpful. We arrived before noon and were able to check in immediately--which was great. I also thought it was lovely that the front desk called to check we settled in OK and whether we needed anything. In all, is not a luxury place, but great for families and clean! Give it a try!

Reviews.Title: “This place was awesome!”
Reviews.Author: chumly22
Reviews.Content: Right from the start, this place was great! Check in was quick and friendly. The room offered a beautiful view of the ocean even though is was set on the side of the hotel. The room was very clean. The bed was comfy. This hotel was eco friendly. Right on the beach..very nice!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel! We were sad to leave”
Reviews.Author: Erin M
Reviews.Content: We checked in on Easter. The gentleman at the front desk was extremely helpful. We got to our room and were surprised at how clean it was. The beds were comfortable and the view was amazing. I was pleasantly surprised by this hotel. We can't wait to come back!

Reviews.Title: “great location on beach”
Reviews.Author: MrsP2
Reviews.Content: We'll be back! Clean room, poolside restaurant on site.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay and Suprisingly Well Done Renovation”
Reviews.Author: Tim S
Reviews.Content: Grew up in the Daytona Beach area and my family and I were on our way to Orlando for a week's vacation, but we knew we were stopping for one night before arriving. Ended up hearing about the renovations and took a chance. I can't honestly say these is a diamond in the rough in Daytona. While I call the area home, Daytona has a long way to go in cleaning up A1A, but this was indeed a pleasant surprise for my family. The room was very nicely appointed and our daughter LOVED the kiddie pool and being right on the beach. All in all, a five out o five for our family.

Reviews.Title: “I had a wonderful time”
Reviews.Author: Anthony B
Reviews.Content: The hotel was beautiful and the hotel front desk(ekta) was very nice and professional... The was was very clean the bed was awesome and we received a awesome view of the ocean....the hotel staff was nice....Beach was very clean the pool was clean and the restaurant food was good...I would stay here again...

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Smoochez
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is beautiful the Hotel front desk staff was very nice and professional. Kudos to Jennifer in group sales is the best! We had a group of 53 people having fun in the sun the trip was wonderful. Beach is very clean, restaurant food was very good, housekeepers on the 5th floor were super sweet. As the group host I received nothing but good reviews from everyone. Thanks for everything Jennifer I was very impressed and we will see you again on our next trip to Daytona Beach! Smoochez P.S. My favorite spot was relaxing in the hottub and sitting by the firepits at night.....

Reviews.Title: “Skeptical, but proven wrong”
Reviews.Author: Jeff L
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were traveling for our anniversary, deciding to go back to where we spent our honeymoon. We wanted to stay by the pier, but could not find anything in a good price range, so we stayed further down the beach. On first arrival, we were greeted very enthusiastically at the front desk. Check in was a breeze, even though we were there 2 hours early. Our room was ready, and we went right up. We were surprised that there were no interior hallways, but this seems normal for Daytona. Upon entering the room, we found a clean, large, and inviting room. The only issue was that the AC was not on. It's an eco friendly room, so when the balcony door is open, the AC shuts off, and comes back on when closed. This did not happen, so the front desk promptly sent someone up to reset the AC, and it worked fine, though it never shut off with the door open. There are two things to consider when staying here. This section of the beach does have traffic, so you have to have to look before crossing. Also, the parking is a little tight, with beams on the lower section of the garage. This can easily be remedied by parking on the upper level, if you don't mind a hot car. Overall, we both enjoyed our stay here, and will definitely consider this for our next trip to Daytona. With many questionable choices on the beach, this one should be considered by all.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome stay”
Reviews.Author: Tanisha M
Reviews.Content: Arrived on a Friday and we leave tomorrow. Had a great time. Beach is very clean, sand is white and the water is clear. Had a great time, no issues checking in. Had a issue with the AC and they sent someone up immediately to fix it. Very impressed with this hotel and would totally stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “We Love the Beach!”
Reviews.Author: ford150Ga
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed here the 20th-22nd of April for the Cheer Competition. Let me first say we arrived 4 hours before time to check in and to our suprise the room was ready. This made us all happy people because we were so ready to hit the beach and pool area. When we walked into our room which was on the 5th floor we were very suprised and how nice and clean the room was. The carpet looked to be brand new free of stains and any sticky feeling like at some other places. The bathroom was very clean with plenty of towels and samples. The room itself smelled great and the furniture on the balcony was very nice to have for relaxing outside. The beds were very comfortable and clean. Also we liked the flat screen T.V. and having the desk for our laptop which we did not have trouble connecting. We drove our midsize SUV and had to park in the back which is fine plenty of room. The only negative thing I can even think of is the elevators being a little slow but that is to be expected. Pool area was great and included plenty of loungers, a fire pit, hot tube and small water park area for the kids. Beach access was close and easy to get to. I would highly recommend the restaurant there the waitstaff was excellent and tends to your every needs. Breakfast and Lunch was great, I even told my husband I did not expect the hotel food to be good but it was great and reasonably priced. I just can't say how much we enjoyed our stay and we had an excellent time.

Reviews.Title: “Great Vacation”
Reviews.Author: barb f
Reviews.Content: Had a great vacation at this hotel. Everything went smooth from check-in to check-out. All the staff were very nice and helpful especially Randi and Becky. Our 5th floor room overlooking the pool was very clean and comfortable and the view was fantastic. Being right on the beach is the best. The perfect weather was a bonus. We enjoyed every minute of it and would go back tomorrow if we could.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for family!”
Reviews.Author: Bubberjo
Reviews.Content: We were there at the end of spring break. Mostly families staying at the hotel. Nice clean rooms. Great pool area. Every room has a beach view. Quiet. Away from the main drag, so if you are wanting to be in on the party scene, this is not for you. They had activities poolside.

Reviews.Title: “Will be visiting in June”
Reviews.Author: LuvMyVacation
Reviews.Content: Based on the overwhelmingly positive reviews, I just booked an oceanfront room for mid June. My husband, 6 year-old son and I will be stopping in for a night after 5 days at Disney. It will be my son's first stay at an oceanfront hotel. I love the ocean/listening to the waves and this place sounds so wonderful that I think I'm looking forward to this stay as much as I am our time at Disney. See you in June!

Reviews.Title: “Great view of the beach”
Reviews.Author: hideyho53
Reviews.Content: The room was clean and the view of the pool and beach were wonderful. Too far to walk to Main Street.

Reviews.Title: “Great Spring Break Location!!”
Reviews.Author: wvgirlchristy
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised by this Holiday Inn Resort. I reserved an oceanfront room with a kitchen and was very pleased. Very nice pool area and they have activities such as pool side bingo and adults can win a free beverage at the bar (kids when other small items). The only reason that I did not give this resort the "Excellent" rating would be due to parking and internet issue I had. The spaces are extremely tight. Thankfully I had a smaller car, but if you have a full size SUV you may have issues parking, but I am not sure really what the hotel can do to fix this unless maybe they build another layer on the parking garage so that spaces could be wider. The other issue I has was with the Internet service. The wifi was somewhat unreliable during my stay. You get a password for the wifi upon check in but wifi was down the entire first night. They did eventually fix it but was still intermittent. I loved the hotel and would highly recommend this hotel. I will be back!! Thanks for a wonderful spring break!!

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: BeachLover19661964
Reviews.Content: After greatly anticipating a much needed vacation with my family, I was disappointed upon arrival. Several weeks ago, we had requested a Double Oceanfront Suite on an upper level floor. Upon arrival we were told we would be on the 1st floor. I asked if an upper level room would be available the next night and they said "no", that our type of room was not available on any of the upper floor for the next few nights (was told that there was only one of the Double Oceanfront Suite on each floor). The girl at the desk didn't really seem concerned with my disappointment, she simply said "oh, I see where you did request an upper level floor". Later in the day, I checked the Holiday Inn website for the hotel and found that our room type was showing as available for the next two nights. Since we had the only one of its type on the 1st floor, it appeared that there were upper floor rooms available for the length of our stay. So, we had no choice but to stick it out on the bottom floor, right next to the pool deck, near a noisy restaurant, and with an obstructed view of the ocean., Though the room was fairly spacious and did show evidence of a fairly recent renovation, the whole experience left me disappointed and reminded me why I don't typically stay at Holiday Inns.

Reviews.Title: “great famiy vacation place!”
Reviews.Author: Garimusprime
Reviews.Content: Unsure of an older hotel, this refurbed hotel was simply great. Seasoned staff kept the place clean and run like a well oiled machine. Just a great experience and family friendly for all ages. Front desk very helpful and accommodating for any request. Will come back here for sure!

Reviews.Title: “Roach motel, Rude staff, Trashy beach, Aging beach town past its prime.”
Reviews.Author: justin c
Reviews.Content: We planned this vacation for a year, and it was a disaster from day 1. We were given room 616 on arrival which had a severe roach problem. The night manager was wonderful, but the day manager Randi Roberts was less than friendly and some of her staff were downright rude throughout our stay. we were told room 616 would be sprayed and we were given room 515 the next day. While moving our things, my wife walked in on an elderly couple getting dressed. apparently they gave us both the same room, so back downstairs once again with all of our luggage in tow and we were moved to room 717 which seemed ok until day 4 when i woke up early in the morning and saw roaches and silverfish in the bathroom and shower. Apparently they have a roach problem due to the rooms being efficiencies and people bringing food during their stay. Don't get me wrong, the renovated hotel is nice. But this is no excuse for their unprofessionalism and poor customer service. I expect this sort of treatment from say a super 8 motel, not a holiday inn resort. I have stayed at many holiday inns and have never experienced the problems i did at this hotel so i'm sure it is an isolated incident. Guess ill stick with Mariott from now on. Also, due to the pool gate to the beach area being unsecured and unmonitored, there is quite a large number of youths and people from the beach taking advantage of the hotel's pool and spa. By my count, there were at least 20 unsupervised children in the pool area. ANOTHER accident waiting to happen. Sadly, the beach was littered with trash every night and while some of it was picked it up, alot of trash remained and it was evident from all of the birds scouring the beach. On a side note, Ormond beach is 15 mins north and quite secluded, clean and beautiful.Also, A large number of beach shops and stores lining the daytona strip were closed or had gone out of business and The boardwalk pier was closed for renovations, since we didnt want to deal with the traffic, our sightseeing options were limited. The renovated hotel is nice at first glance, but masks the underlying problems of a poorly trained staff overwhelmed with day to day operations of such a large hotel and it becomes evident in its treatment of guests. Also, despite leaving a very generous tip for our server, he never once returned to check on us or the other family seated next to us. The hotel seems more concerned with turnover and enhancing their bottom line as i later learned room 616 was booked by another family within an hour and half of our switching rooms, so i doubt the roach and silverfish problem was treated for the next guests. With the new renovation, this resort has the potential to become a wonderful destination but ownership dropped the ball with the poorly trained management and staff and in my opinion falls short of a "resort". I took pictures of the roaches with my camera phone, because Ms. Roberts seemed not to believe us, and despite bringing these issues to the attention of ownership and management, their response was pretty much, "sorry, but we can offer you some excellent discounted rates on your next stay!" Heh. While i'm sure, judging from the many positive comments on here, many families had a wonderful stay, unfortunately, ours was not one of them.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful customer service”
Reviews.Author: leighlandry
Reviews.Content: Becky at the front desk is the best. She actually called a resturant to see if they were open late for us. When we arrived they were at the door waiting for us(Chart House). We were informed during the meal that Becky had ordered and was covering the payment of lava cake for dessert for us!!! Everyone at the front desk was wonderful but this was special.

Reviews.Title: “En route to Disney”
Reviews.Author: junctionscot
Reviews.Content: Quite a busy hotel but the room was quiet. All fixtures were new - bed was very comfortable, bathroom was very well equipped. Balcony overlooked the pool and beach - very pleasant. The big disappointment was the restaurant food and service. We ordered one drink and none came near us after that for about an hour. We had to buttonhole someone to get a menu - it took ages for someone to takes our order adn another long period of time for the food to arrive. When it came, it was poor in presentation and quality. The waitress did apologise later for the inadequacy of the service. After going back to the room to sleep, we had to listen to a dreadful singer on the patio - eventually we complained and someone shut him up.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Hotel”
Reviews.Author: lvtoske
Reviews.Content: This hotel is right on the beach. The oceanfront suite we had was spacious and clean, and had a lovely balcony. It was also very quiet due to the soundproofing. The staff there are the best. By the second day Becky (at the front desk) knew my name and was very helpful. We ate dinner at the restaurant (outside) and the food was reasonably priced and quite tasty. The location is close to the downtown Daytona Beach but actually very quiet which made it nice for us. There is also a 711 right across the street where we bought snacks and beverages. Would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: “On our way to 1st ever cruise !!”
Reviews.Author: CherylandJerry58
Reviews.Content: Since we were traveling to Miami for our cruise departure,we decided to leave a little early and stop for the night. We had never been to Daytona, so decided to make this our layover. Found the Holiday Inn on my credit card discount and then did some checking on tripadvisor and decided to give it a try. Too bad we only had 1 evening here. The hotel was nice and right on the ocean. If we ever come back this way we will definitely come back here !!

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected”
Reviews.Author: boudta
Reviews.Content: We booked Holiday Inn because it was priced right and it had good reviews. We were pleasantly surprised at the nicely remodeled rooms with a great beach view. The room was clean and the bathroom was spacious with a nice shower head. The room had a mini fridge and a microwave. This helped to buy a pack of water to have cooling to keep us hydrated on the hot, sunny weekend. The pool area was very nice and clean with pool maintenance performed each morning. The pool is only a few steps from the beach so we had the best of the beach atmosphere with the comfortable pool lounge chairs and towels. The kids enjoyed the small game room and the ice cream vending machine. We were pleased with the restaurant. The breakfast was hot and good tasting and served quickly. We had a friendly server. The food was not overpriced, I feel like we received good portions. I am rarely impressed and feel that we received more than expected but this Holiday Inn was better than we planned. I would recommend this resort. The only downfall is the lack of restaurants and things to do in the immediate area. You will want to drive to look around.

Reviews.Title: “very nice stay!”
Reviews.Author: Adrienne H
Reviews.Content: My husband I were very happy with our stay! Friendly staff and very clean rooms! The view from our room was great! Balcony facing the ocean and being able to watch the sun come up every morning was the best! Very nice and clean pool area! Good location and walking distance too many shops and restartants! Would recommend to others and we will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Bike Week Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Lisa W
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were down for Bike Week 2012 and we had a fantastic time and alot had to do with the staff and management for this Holiday Inn. I have to give hats off to Erika and Randy. They were always smiling no matter how busy they were and everytime I saw Erika she remembered my name. That says alot right there. We had an issue with the air conditioner one night and within 5 minutes someone was up there and fixed it right away and we never had an issue again. Anytime we go to Florida I will be staying at this resort. We stayed in a room with a kitchenette and it was great!Thanks for making our stay an enjoyable one. Lisa

Reviews.Title: “best hotel on daytona beach”
Reviews.Author: orlandodiva
Reviews.Content: whenever we come to daytona beach we always stay here great pricing, food is really good and staff are very friendly really care about you, and hotel is lovely new and clean great for familys used to stay at hilton but this hotel is nicer not over priced its affordable for everyone you dont go home feeling youve over spent love it we cant wait to come back again

Reviews.Title: “bike week haven”
Reviews.Author: erham
Reviews.Content: didn't realize when i booked it would be bike week. i thought it would be noisy but rooms were well insulated. weather sucked but heated pool, hot tub, and restaurant made up for it. the food was great and the rooms were clean

Reviews.Title: “Just ok..”
Reviews.Author: puddlejumpers
Reviews.Content: Stayed 1 night during Speed week with my husband, and 2 teenagers.. booked an ocean front room, and received a room on the left side of the building, due to our booking not being ready in the late afternoon.. room was clean, but the small deck was covered in ashes from previous guests..pool was nice, and the grounds were clean. The price was over 170.00 for the night, felt it was a little high considering we booked direct with hotel and didn't receive what we had expected, an Oceanfront room..overall average, also didn't like the dimly lit outdoor halls in the evening.

Reviews.Title: “Was not worth $150 a night.”
Reviews.Author: VelmaBuckman
Reviews.Content: We called and asked them if they were aceptingthe travelers coupons. They said yes. We get there and the person refused the coupon so we paid for a night. We didnt get beach access cause of rain and the restruant inside was well not worth the money we spent on food. It was the worst place we have ever been too. I will not go back there either.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: shellboell
Reviews.Content: Our room was spacious and clean ocean front room. The hotel restaurant had outside seating and the food was good. It is what you would expect for the hotel brand.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice place”
Reviews.Author: Buffaloney84
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night with no reservations the week before the Daytona 500. The room was incredibly expensive for a Holiday Inn, but the location is great with beach views from every room. We got the rate that included breakfast and it was hands down the best free breakfast we have ever had. The pool was clean, clear, warm and deep. The beds are comfortable with an excellent choice of pillows. Everything was very clean, especially for an older hotel. Nice place.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay-We Will Be Back!”
Reviews.Author: jelh
Reviews.Content: This was an excellent couple of days great views, nice rooms, friendly helpful staff the lady that manages the bar makes the best pina colada she was always helpful friendly and efficient. The really value Priority Club members first hotel we stayed in on this trip that recognised it!! Just a small point which we will remember for future stays don't stay in a room close to carpark gate bangs early in the morning until late at night when it's busy can be an unwanted wake up call. All the staff seem to enjoy their work which is often a culture generated by senior management so a well managed resort.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to visit again.”
Reviews.Author: Faye M
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the holiday Inn Resort just one night and did not want to leave. We were on our way to Palm Beach and there we stayed at a 5 star resort and I can say this and mean it. It was not as nice or clean as your hotel. We are planning another trip this year and hope to stay here. I had not been to Daytona in many years and so many good memories came back to me that I really do want to visit again this year.

Reviews.Title: “WOW! What a view!!!”
Reviews.Author: southNobleford
Reviews.Content: See and hear the Atlantic Ocean from your balcony. Watch the sunrise!!!!! and take a beach walk. Food from the restaurant enjoyed on the outside deck is fabulous - especially the salmon. A great place for a getaway!!

Reviews.Title: “Remodel Great”
Reviews.Author: Dick R
Reviews.Content: Been going to Daytona Beach for over 50 years and have seen many re-models. This re-model is the nicest I've seen. Would definately recommend this motel as it is very clean and comfortable. Ocean view is great, restaurant is reasonable and pool is great.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderfull !”
Reviews.Author: CarolinaTraveler
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night after a fiasco at another hotel in DB. The front desk was absolutely marvelous. We got a great rate, and a double upgrade. Nice, clean room, no musty ocean smell. Great pool, fire pit and hot tub. If I come back to Daytona Beach THIS is where I would stay!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: keeklaire
Reviews.Content: Very clean and comfortable. Staff is excellent and location is perfect. A large group of us stays twice a year for business.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful stay!”
Reviews.Author: SGL61
Reviews.Content: We just got back home from staying at this Holiday Inn Resort and we had a wonderful experience! We were upgraded to a room with a kitchen and oceanfront view, which was lovely. The bedroom, kitchen, and bathroom were clean and the interior design was very nice! I thought it was neat how the bathroom shampoo, conditioner, and lotion were all Coconut Lime Verbena from Bath and Body Works. I loved the outdoor pool and hot tub and sitting outside by the fire pit at night was fun and relaxing. The place as a whole is very aesthetically pleasing! The hotel has a restaurant with great food and occasional live music. I especially enjoyed ordering breakfast from room service (which is not free, by the way.) Anytime we needed anything the service was surprisingly prompt! The employees are very professional and seem to take great pride in their establishment. I was expecting the bathroom adjoining the pool and beach to probably be somewhat dirty, but it was super clean and smelled amazing! I felt pampered at the Holiday Inn Resort and would definitely stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Staying here in April 2012”
Reviews.Author: Jon C
Reviews.Content: This will be our 5th trip to Daytona, but will be our first time to stay at the Holiday Inn Resort. Previously, we've stayed at the Hilton which we have always liked, but sometimes their service and friendliness did lack a little. We are making the trip this April for my daughters college dance team's national competition and they are staying at the Holiday Inn Resort. So, we decided to stay here too. I was curious as to how nice this hotel would be, but after reading all of these great reviews, we are really looking forward to staying at this hotel and having an awesome time.

Reviews.Title: “Looking forward to getting here!!!”
Reviews.Author: KBH12
Reviews.Content: Haven't stayed here yet....37 more days....I chose this hotel because of the reviews on several different sites. I spent A LOT of time checking several hotels/resorts and was really surprised by some of the bad reviews I read about well known "name" hotels. (Bad housekeeping, rude staff, stained things in rooms, bad parking, long waits to check-in etc.). The Holiday Inn (1615 S Atlantic one), consistently had great reviews. We were not looking for anything crazy, just cleanliness and safety. I finally decided to book online thru the hotels website and inadvertantly put the wrong expiration date for my credit card. I kept checking my bank account and after five days, I realized the charge hadn't gone thru and called the front desk. The man I spoke to was super nice and checked everything out and told me what the problem was. He then took the correct information and thanked me for calling. I would have been so bummed if we lost the reservation. After talking to this man for a few minutes I was glad I booked there. He seemed like a great guy and his niceness and attitude basically confirmed I had made the right choice!!! Cannot wait to get there!!!!!!!!!! See you on the 11th of March!

Reviews.Title: “January at Daytona”
Reviews.Author: swf1107
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I were on a road trip to move here from Colorado to New Jersey and decided we needed a little R&R in some warmer climates so we headed south to Florida for a couple of days and stayed in Daytona at the Holiday Inn Resort, Oceanfront in Daytona. The room was very comfortable, the view from the balcony that was overlooking the beach was spectacular. While breakfast was not included we ordered it up and sat outside and it was wonderful. We hit it just right, the weather was gorgeous, 80 degrees in mid-January, very mild. The gentleman at the front desk was very helpful and gave us a late checkout. Overall, it was very good...

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: Linda4172
Reviews.Content: We were pleased with the accommodation, location and free internet. We went swimming in the pool and happily enjoyed it all to ourselves....yes, we're Canadian...lol. The hot tub was out of order. Upon check out, I accidently forgot my bathing suit, having left it to dry in the shower of the room. It hasn't turned up in lost and found, which I find disappointing. Otherwise, a good stay in a nice room, with the lovely beach and ocean in view.

Reviews.Title: “Great View”
Reviews.Author: CrazzzyDe
Reviews.Content: Pick this hotel because of the reviews for trip advisor and glad we did. The end of Dec. is not the best time to travel as it was cold and windy but we were traveling to visit family. We just about had to place to ourself. Lg swimming pool, kiddy pool, hot tub and easy essay to the beach. Also a game room, exercise room and a bar/restaurant (all 3 were small but comfortable.) We had a balcony overlooking the beach which was absolutely beautiful. Every one we encountered that worked there was knowledgeable, accommodating, and pleasurable. The best part of the whole hotel stay were the fire pits (2) located in the swimming pool area. As I had stated it was cold and windy but the fire pits really made all the difference. Would recommend staying here!!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: MJCNewYork_NewYork
Reviews.Content: When I arrived I was impressed with the entire property. The front desk staff were great, I had no issues at all. I enjoyed the oceanfront view after a long day at work. The staff at the restaurant was great, they are very personable and know you by your first after one time. I stayed in late April, a perfect time. I would recommend the Holiday Inn Resort to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place in Daytona !!”
Reviews.Author: GeorgePol
Reviews.Content: Stayed here this month , great place, good location, fantastic view from my balcony , I'd go here again !!

Reviews.Title: “Nice Views looking at the Ocean”
Reviews.Author: Ganvi
Reviews.Content: All the balconied rooms face the Ocean which is a few feet away from the property. The room we were on (thanks to my wife who booked us here) also was right above the heated gorgeous pool which is flanked by a Hot Jacuzzi/Sauna on one side as well a couple of fire pits on the other side. The hotel authorities run the fire pits till late in the night and it was awesome two wintry nights in a row we (wife,kids & self) were listening to the waves and sulking near the warm fire pits. The hotel also entertained the family (Especially the kids) by conducting various games (like Bingo) next to the pool area. Thanks to the upgraded Kitchenette we had, listening to the Ocean tides thru the balcony, sipping a Miller lite and savouring the crispy 'Indian Dosas' my wife made - it was bliss! - This hotel is Highly recommended for winter travel since it was quite empty as well....

Reviews.Title: “Older hotel that's been renovated”
Reviews.Author: RuthInFL
Reviews.Content: Though we didn't actually stay here we did visit relatives who were. It's a nice enough place, but no way a 5 star hotel. The room was large enough, a typical size for hotels along this stretch of the Atlantic coast. It should be noted that 1/2 of the hotel has swimming pool between ocean and hotel and the other half has parking lot between hotel and ocean. So if the hotel were busy or booked it could get pretty noisy right below your room.

Reviews.Title: “Best vacation ever!!”
Reviews.Author: mcook59
Reviews.Content: We couldn't have asked for anything better. Staff was fantastic, the room was incredible and the ocean view was perfect!!! This is a must stay place any time you are in Daytona. We will be back every December and we will be staying here. Perfect hotel and Daytona was so easy to get around. No complaints as the hotel was pefect. All the photos on here reflect the way the rooms are. Updated and clean! You will not regret a stay at this hotel! I wanted to bring the bed home with me it was so comfy!! Huge shower. We had a king bed suite and the the seperate bedroom had full size closet with TV.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: Cruisingfam
Reviews.Content: Hotel lobby is small. Rooms were clean,but outside corridors. Water leaked in thru ac unit and soaked carpet. We let them know and one guy seemed suspicious. We let another lady know and she said it happens due to a design flaw when hotel was built. Hope I don't find extra charges on my acct when I get home.

Reviews.Title: “Best Place Ever”
Reviews.Author: Providence_KyMichael
Reviews.Content: I came to holiday inn resort not to long ago i loved it i felt like i was at home! ready to come back headeding there soon :)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay. Great value.”
Reviews.Author: royayn
Reviews.Content: Terrific. That’s the best word I can use to sum up our stay. We got a three-night bargain deal and had never been there, so we didn’t know what to expect, other than the good reviews we saw here. We purposely chose a time of year that wouldn’t be busy, yet still warm enough to be beach weather, plus we went midweek. Those decisions really paid off. The hotel runs basically parallel to the beach, so nearly all the rooms face the ocean. You enter from the exterior in the front, on the road side, and the rooms run through the building to the back, where there’s a sliding glass door to a balcony facing the ocean. It looks like there are a few rooms on either end that don’t have the ocean view or the balcony. I’m sure that’s what we were supposed to get on our bargain rate. But when we checked in, we mentioned that we were Priority Club members. Because of that (and, I’m sure, because the hotel was so empty), we were upgraded to the top (seventh) floor, facing the ocean, in the middle of the hotel. Fantastic.
