We were also offered late checkout and a couple of drink coupons. The front desk staff couldn’t have been more helpful. They even called an hour after we checked in to make sure we had everything we needed. I have to say the money put into the renovations really shows. This is among the best Holiday Inns I’ve stayed at. Everything feels neat and clean and new. One interesting tidbit: At the shopping area up the beach we ran into someone who works at another hotel. Once he found out where we were staying, he said “Is it as nice on the inside as it looks from the outside?’’ We said yes, of course. But from what he said, the renovations have caused a buzz among the beach hotel community. The pool is nice, fire pits are a nice touch for an evening drink. Beach is beautiful of course. And being on the seventh floor (bugs don’t fly that high), and being there in late October (perfect weather), we were able to sleep with the slider open listening to the waves crash on the beach all night long. As some people have said, I could see where parking could be dicey at times. They’ve got a double-deck lot on the front (road) side and a smaller lot on the back (beach) side. It’s tight. It was no issue at all for us, but I can see that it might be a squeeze with a full house. If you’re into the shopping/clubbing/nightlife, there are other hotels closer to the center of the action than this. You could walk it, but probably wouldn’t want to. For us that was just fine, but something to consider if you like to be within walking distance of the center of the action. A very small quibble: wireless connection in the room was a little dicey. Most times it was fine, but it seemed cranky at times. Just an aside, because a few people have mentioned it. Yes, there’s a resort fee. It’s smaller than most I’ve seen. I’m never quite sure what this is for. The pool? The fire pit? On the last of our four days we heard a poolside bingo game going on, so I guess that was part of it. But I don’t blame these guys. Most hotels play the “resort fee’’ game, so they can list a lower room rate, then tack on a mandatory fee, even if you have no intention of joining in the bingo game. Since the fee is mandatory, I would be thrilled if all hotels just built it into the room rate so when you compare rates you get a true comparison. I definitely appreciate those hotels who build it into the room rate. I’ve wasted too much of my time comparing rates, only to find out that the lowest wasn’t really the lowest because of the hidden fee that I had to burrow through a web site to find. Again, that’s not a criticism of this hotel. Their fee is lower than most. But it’s an industry practice I could do without.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, with comfortable Beds.”
Reviews.Author: jrobba
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Holiday Inn Resort Daytona Beach Oceanfront, as part of a deal purchased through Living Social. The hotel was great, seemed like it was recently renovated, as most hotels on the shore line have a very old feel to them. The beds were extremely comfortable, and the pillows as well. In fact, we ended up buying one of their pillows, because it was so comfortable. They had a great heated pool, that lights up at night, along with a hot tub and gas fire pit. It's also right on the beach and you walk out the back for easy access. We ate at the restaurant downstairs for breakfast which was decent, probably a tad overpriced, but the food was good and it was nice to sit outside and eat next to the ocean. All and all it was a very good trip, the only blemish on the hotel was the living social deal put on by Calypso Cay resort (A sister property in Orlando), tried to tack on a 90 minute time share presentation, which is not stated in the Living Social deal. I think that not only am I the wrong demographic for trying to make me sit through their presentation, it's a bad business move to try to add in a hidden catch after I've purchased the deal. I called Living Social about it, and they were not aware of any presentation, and told me that the Resort would be in breach of contract if they made sit through it. So they backed off, and we had a nice time from there on out. Beware, Living Social customers, that the Holiday Host (check in point) will probably try to pull this same one on you.

Reviews.Title: “No complaints, beautiful view.”
Reviews.Author: Gizm098
Reviews.Content: Stayed here Nov 17- 21. The room was pretty good, clean, and no bugs anywhere, which was really good, as I was on the ground floor. Refrigerator and microwave is convenient. The TV was good, but could certainly use a few more channels; I expected more than what they had, which was about 14 thru 39 or so? But it was sufficient. Pool was clean. Ocean was very nice. Try to get a room facing the ocean; I had one facing a vacant lot on the south side of the hotel, but still not the end of the world. The restaurant-bar was ok. I had an omelette breakfast, it was ok but the potatoes seemed like they had been sitting awhile and the cook just quickly reheated them. I had a burger in the evening with fries, and that was fine. The ladies working the bar always seemed pleasant. The front desk folks were good, too. One lady helped me find a Notary on a Saturday afternoon, which was a big help. The 2 guys who work the afternoon shift were always friendly and seemed to have a good sense of humor. Not much within walking distance. A 7/11 (small convenience store)across the street for any essentials or a newspaper, and a restaurant called Marco's which I ate in once and it was ok, but it was just a woman cooking and her husband doing the waiter stuff, but they pulled it off. Great beach right outside. But be aware that cars are driving on the beach and at high tide there is not much room to lay out there with the car lane there. You have to keep an eye out for the cars, especially if you have little kids. But the pool is there and that is good. Good childrens pool area, too. And the fire pits really look nice when they are going at night. I would stay here again, no real complaints at all.

Reviews.Title: “Great Job!”
Reviews.Author: kim d
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel when it had another name but when we came back this year we were blown away! They have totally renovated it! The rooms are beautiful. The pool looked brand new and they even added a childrens wet play area which our kids loved! We'll definitely keep coming here!

Reviews.Title: “5 Star Resort ALL The Way!!!”
Reviews.Author: Mary R
Reviews.Content: My children and I stayed for a weekend getaway. The front desk clerk was so friendly and courteous. They advised us that there was a free breakfast and a child activity center that the kids could get involved in. So we went for the free breakfast and we were greeted at the door by Bill Netcher. He made sure the kids were happy and that made me happy. Jose was our server and I felt he went over and beyond his job. This is the only place I have ever gone where they REALLY welcome children.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Fabulous”
Reviews.Author: Jaime D
Reviews.Content: We checked in late and were greeted by the super friendly and helpful staff. They even closed off one entrances so that we were conveniently parked. The hotel was beautiful! The rooms were so comfortable and clean. All the rooms face the beach and over look the gorgeous pool area that even had 2 fire pits. It is so close to everything. We were able to walk to the pier and enjoy a movie, shopping, and dining. This is by far the best hotel I have stayed at in the area. We enjoyed our stay and plan to go back soon.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!!!!”
Reviews.Author: moe m
Reviews.Content: Very good customer services, the staff was on top of it. The hotel was very clean and kept well, felt like I was home. The experience was awesome, waking up listening to the sound of the ocean. I will definitely come back and stay at this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleased -- will visit again.”
Reviews.Author: Tawny2011
Reviews.Content: We wanted to spend one night in Daytona before going to Disney since we had never been there and our grandchildren had never seen the ocean. We leaned toward Holiday Inn since it was a name I trusted and the positive online reviews led me to show up on their door step requesting a room. Renee was wonderful. She hooked us up with two adjoining rooms and we had a wonderful time. The hotel is very tastefull/classy and has a luxurious feel. The staff are attentive and most importantly -- everything is CLEAN. We enjoyed the beach, which could not have been any closer, the pool, which could not have been nicer, the hottub, which could not have been any more inviting. After dark the pool was lit with a very cool purple light and they made a fire in the fire pit. It was the perfect place to relax in a secure and extremely comfortable setting enjoying a complimentary drink from the bar. We watched the sunrise from our private balcony and had breakfast outside beside the ocean the next morning. It just doesn't get any better --- we'll be back.

Reviews.Title: “Surprised and very happy”
Reviews.Author: Dribar
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed on the 4th floor for the weekend. Everything about this hotel is great -- location, views, rooms, pool and the staff were all very pleasant and helpful. Very cool that all rooms face the beach. We walked down to the main pier where the ferris wheel and beach walk are -- how cool. Very very nice hotel. All positive. the rooms looked like new inside -- great beds, multiple pillow options.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel”
Reviews.Author: NotfussyCanucks
Reviews.Content: When we travel we always try and stay in a Holiday Inn. They are consistently great, clean and comfortable and the Holiday Inn Resort Daytona Beach Oceanfront diid not dissappoint us. We loved it and will certainly go back.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best Hotels in the area!”
Reviews.Author: bhester
Reviews.Content: My wife and I spent only one night here with our two granddaughters. But we loved it! It has a very nice large outside pool and a hot tub. At night they have two really nice gas fire pits to sit around. All the rooms are ocean view and have balconies. Rooms were clean and the employees were all very nice. We walked along the beach and I would say this hotel looked to be one of the nicest ones in the area. As a Priority Club Platinum member, we were upgraded to a room with a kitchenette. Those rooms are a little larger. Holiday Inn really takes care of repeat customers, with their Priority Club!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: dillhate
Reviews.Content: Spent four days here with my wife and son. It's obvious the property is newly renovated. Our room was fabulous, well decorated, roomy, comfortable, with a balcony overlooking the ocean. The pool is wonderful, nice and clean, with plenty of chairs and a hot tub. Great pool bar/ restaurant. Jose and Shannon served us great food and drinks every day and were especially nice to my son, who was celebrating his 7th birthday. They made him fancy kiddie cocktails, which he got a kick out of.The food was excellent. We had lunch pool-side all four days we were there, and everything we had was delicious.Kids eat free which was a bonus.This is an awesome place for families. During the day they have an activities director who organized pool side bingo, scavenger hunts etc., and at night they had the fire pits going which were a perfect place to wind down. They also have a decent game room.. I cannot say enough about how friendly and attentive every member of the staff was to us. Another bonus was the welcome gifts we received upon arrival for being Priority Club members. My son received a sand pail full of odds and ends, and my wife received a welcome bag with bottles of water, cookies and free miniature golf passes. We are definitely coming back to this hotel, and hopefully will have the same experience the next time.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean and new. Friendly fun staff.”
Reviews.Author: jvvjen
Reviews.Content: We visited during the MS150 bike race a couple weeks ago. We had one room at the Hilton (the host hotel) for after our 86 mile ride... but they were booked before our second room was reserved. So, we booked another room at this hotel for our support team (aka friends who would drink with us after the ride). I generally like to stay at a modern style, newer hotel, mostly because I feel like they'll be cleaner. After searching through tens of hotels on TripAdvisor, most of which looked a bit old and a lot cheesy... we finally settled on this one. We were very happy we did. In fact, we were very tempted to have our friends stay at the host hotel so we could enjoy the huge modern style bathroom with a shower with room for six people... and a very nice balcony with a view of the water. All in all, this has to be one of the nicest - cleanest - newest - most modernly convenient - of any in Daytona. We stayed in a suite with a pullout in the living room. Don't know if all the rooms are suites, but if you are planning a longer visit, the kitchen was nice and the suite would comfortably sleep 4 if you don't mind a pull out. The staff was also friendly and welcoming. They gave us a couple free drink tickets and gave us an upgrade. Family friendly too... at least for our visit. If and when I return to Daytona, perhaps for the MS150 next year, we will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Really enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: anywhereforfun
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this Holiday Inn resort this past weekend during a monsoon of a storm that lasted all weekend :( There were several things that made our stay pleasurable, not just bearable: 1. The Hot tub: The hot tub was outside by the pool with a great view of the ocean. It was nice and hot, so we didn't mind the rain coming down or wind blowing. 2. The room was large and comfortable with a beautiful view of the ocean. It was amazing watching the wind blow the trees and the HUGE waves breaking! The bed and pillows were great, and the bathroom is large and well-appointed. Big screen TV for the baseball playoffs. And the maid service was above average. 3. The hotel bar, H2O, was pleasant and comfortable. Food was served here but we didn't try any. The margarita was delicious and priced reasonably. 4. Monday morning the storm had cleared and there was a veritable army of workers righting the exterior of the hotel. There was an incredible amount of work to do, but each person we ran into was friendly, cheerful, and courteous. It could have been a miserable weekend getaway, but we had a great time despite the weather because of this classy, well-run resort.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING HOTEL!”
Reviews.Author: MrsGusky
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best place we have stayed in for visits to Daytona Beach! The Kids Suite was awesome and our daughter loved having her own space in our room. The staff was AMAZING!!!!! The manager Randi met us on check in and they gave our daughter a fantastic welcome kit full of great goodies that she played with the entire weekend. Breakfast was AWESOME!!!! Our server, Jose, was the best! He made sure we had everything we needed. We truly were treated like the royal family during our visit. We will certainly stay here every time we visit Daytona Beach!

Reviews.Title: “A beautiful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Beth H
Reviews.Content: This is our first trip to Daytona and definitely a wonderful experience! I have been to Destin, Panama City and Myrtle Beach and this is probably the nicest resort I've been too. Staff is friendly and make you feel at home the minute you walk in. We will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “Best value on strip!”
Reviews.Author: Dmycc
Reviews.Content: Great location, spectacular views and service equal to none! Don

Reviews.Title: “Nice beachfront getaway”
Reviews.Author: R0bot
Reviews.Content: Our family (myself, wife, five year old daughter) selected this hotel for a post-Labor Day weekend getaway. We were warmly greeted as Priority Club (Holiday Inn's rewards program) members and were upgraded to a suite. The room had fabulous views of the ocean and beach, and had modern if not lavish furnishings. The hotel's architecture is somewhat older (some of the other reviews have noted a little awkwardness in the room layouts) but the rooms have been upgraded about as much as they can be without knocking down the whole building and starting over. We enjoyed the pool (large and comfortable temperature) and the poolside bar. When we were there, the hotel didn't appear to be very busy, kind of off season for the dates we visited. This hotel is located a little distance from the 'Boardwalk' area of Daytona Beach - good and bad, good as that means it's quieter and not as crazy-party oriented, but also there's not a lot of restaurants or other attractions within walking distance. We still tried to find some good local offsite restaurants but surprisingly one of our best meals was breakfast at the hotel - service was super attentive, prices surprisingly reasonable, and food was great. The big attraction is of course the beach, which did not disappoint, and we took great advantage of it. We were a little let down that the hotel didn't have more organized activities for our five year old because she really enjoys them. Apparently, based on the flyers we saw, kids' activities take place early Saturday afternoon and scheduled activites for other days are more grown up oriented. The hotel has a 'splash pool' for kids that is geared more towards 1-3 year olds, it also has an indoor kids activities center that looked inviting from the inside but was always closed when we went by (might be a rainy day thing). On our trip the weather was great and we spent our time on the beach or by the pool anyway. All in all we had a great time on our getaway and enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The beachfront vistas are about as nice as it gets, hotel staff was cordial and helpful, and the room was comfortable and modern. We'd definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Surprisingly Nice”
Reviews.Author: MissIzzy
Reviews.Content: My husband &I visit the Daytona area often so when I found a super price online for a 3-day vacation, I booked it. For this price we expected to get a really lousy room. Were we surprised. Dawn greeted us w/a a big smile & made check-in a breeze. Our room was oceanfront; lovely tile & granite bathroom w/ hairdryer; nice kitchenette w/ granite & full-size stainless fridge & microwave. The bed was fabulous w/a a soft pillow & a firm pillow(they were labeled!). Details n this place made such a difference-from the soap dishes to the hidden kitchen garbage can to the pillows, it is a comfortable & pleasant room. Dawn even called to ask if our room was ok & make sure all was ok. Pool area very nice, kiddie pool great --large area. Saw the hot tub but didn't use. Oceanfront cafe very nice, service very good. Drinks strong & sandwiches were fresh & hot. Hotel is about two miles from the boardwalk but convenient to everything. We had a wonderful time & will definitely return!

Reviews.Title: “Great location and awesome beach view”
Reviews.Author: pcampisi
Reviews.Content: Spent 6 nights at the Holiday Inn Resort with my best friend and my 2 teenage sons. We had a Suite with a private balcony overlooking the ocean. Room was very spacious with a separate bedroom area for privacy. Bathroom was quite large as well. Kids really enjoyed the pool area and it stayed open until 11pm each night. Convenient beach access was a plus. Very clean with friendly staff. Housekeeping did a great job each day cleaning the room. Would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Staff & Hotel - The best Holiday Inn we've stayed in”
Reviews.Author: Linda P
Reviews.Content: This place was everything I've read about and more. Being a priority club member we've stayed at several Holiday Inn hotels for our family vacations and I have to say this was by far THE BEST. It was modern, clean and the service we received from the staff was superb. They made you feel comfortable and were extremely accomodating from the moment we walked in until the time we checked out! Always with a smile on their face making you feel at home. Our room was spotless, the beds comfortable and we had a spectacular view of the ocean not to mention every accomodation we could need (kitchen, stove, refrigerator, dishes, etc) and free wi-fi. The pool was crystal clear every day and even the lounge chairs by the pool were new, clean and comfortable. There were activities daily for the little ones as well as the gated splash pool. If I could of I would have stayed longer. We will definitely be staying here again on our next trip to Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel and excellent staff !”
Reviews.Author: Muncietraveler
Reviews.Content: We were in Florida for my daughter's wedding and then wanted to relax at Daytona Beach for several days. This was one of the best stays in Florida we have ever had because the hotel was fabulous. It looks like an older hotel on the outside, but the rooms are beautiful, clean, comfy beds, we had a kitchenette - all appliances, kitchen cookware etc looked brand new - spotless clean. How many times can you go to a hotel and say you had NO complaints whatsoever. Front desk staff extremely friendly and pleasant, restaurant staff are a 10+, one of the waiters has been there 9 years and is over the top the best waiter I have ever had. They play Bingo by the pool which is over the top fun. Hotel pool and restaurant overlooks ocean - its a breathtaking view and the ocean is sooo close to the pool you can go back and forth with the kids and not wear yourself out. We all loved this place and would definitely go back if in the Daytona area again. One note - it is down on the south end of beach and it is an ideal location. Your still close to everything but you don't have that crazy noise level . Believe me - its the perfect place for couples or families with kids to stay. Pool is spectacularly clean and at night they light the fire pits and the poool changes colors - just another great feature of this place. There is also a cute splash pool for little ones.

Reviews.Title: “one day in heavan”
Reviews.Author: laydvee2001
Reviews.Content: I stayed here to celebrate my husbands birthday and the hotel was great can not say the same about the people next door to us .the food was good the room was great ..now the one thing that drive me crazy is people always complaining bout staff andclean room here are somethings you may want to know about hotel. 1 when the hotels are full and people ask for late check out it sometimes delay. The cleaning staff they have to clean the room and then wait for the supervisors to be inspected so you do nice to the staff yelling and getting an attitude will not help your case be calm

Reviews.Title: “A good, dependable choice.”
Reviews.Author: DinainJax
Reviews.Content: Wasn't exactly the Ritz, but I get the feeling that for the Daytona Beach area, it was higher end. The property was clean, the rooms were recently renovated, and the staff was friendly. The pool area and beach access were especially nice, and the breakfast at the restaurant was reasonably priced. A decent choice all around.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel - Great Location”
Reviews.Author: KatieLaGrange
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The hotel is totally renovated. The room we stayed in was perfect and roomy enough for our family of 4. We loved the mini kitchen and full fridge. Parking was never an issue on the property and they were booked. We also liked that a there were 2 beach accesses close by so we could drive our car with all our stuff to the beach each day. We were here during Spring Break and the NCA Cheerleading Competition. We were a mile from all the "action" which was close enough but not too clos. There were several Cheer teams at our hotel and they all conducted themselves with class and were not disruptive. We ate breakfast at the hotel and is was great. The staff was nice and attentive.

Reviews.Title: “Wow! clean modern majestic view ocean front Hilton is the best”
Reviews.Author: Flor5
Reviews.Content: This room is the cleaness and beautiful place m'y family of 5 i have been in florida . The personel is polite always smiling and helpfull specialy Steve at the desk . Granit counter double shower superb !!! Two queen beds and a sofa bed whith kitchen and a balcony to Die for!!!!! This is the place for Next year vacation for sure

Reviews.Title: “So Glad To See These Reviews”
Reviews.Author: CBTravel11
Reviews.Content: I travel a lot for business but next week I’m taking my mother down to Daytona Beach for vacation. I always stay at Holiday Inn hotels when I travel so I am extremely happy to see great reviews on this hotel. I booked this hotel because the great reviews and because I always enjoy the great rooms and service from Holiday Inn when I travel for work. I look forward to staying at this Holiday Inn Resort and I will post my review of this resort after my stay. I can’t wait….

Reviews.Title: “Loved it and Will be Back”
Reviews.Author: JoAnne V
Reviews.Content: We stumbled upon the Holiday Inn after checking in to our original hotel and being completely dissatisfied. We drove up and down Atlantic Blvd in search of a new hotel on our first night in Daytona and came across the Holiday Inn at 10pm. We had a oceanfront room over looking the pool and ocean. It was a beauiful view. The room was clean and roomy, the staff was friendly and accommodating. We would definately stay here again on our next trip to Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Yoshimitsu77
Reviews.Content: Just spent three nights at this hotel and was very pleased with this hotel. I highly recommend the two room suite. Lots of room for a family and it even has a full size fridge, microwave, toaster and electric stove top. We ended up eating in most of the time. Room was spotless and seemed very new. loved the walk in shower with the height adjustable handheld shower head. Great view of the ocean as well. Beds were super comfortable and the pull out bed was way better then the typical sofa bed mattress and my boys loved it. Will definitely stay here again the next time we are at Daytona Beach.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful view, beautiful rooms!”
Reviews.Author: Wfoxjac
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed a short weekend vacation at this hotel with my wife and absolutely loved it! Right on the beach, our view was fantastic. And I can't believe the quality of the room and the quality of service I received for what I paid. An excellent, excellent value! This will be my #1 choice the next time I'm in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “loved it and highly recomend it”
Reviews.Author: cooldudett
Reviews.Content: This is our 7th or 8th time at Daytona at different hotels and is the first time ever that a few moments after entering our room the front desk called us to ensure everything was perfect and the we liked our room. We did need 2 extra chairs since there were 4 people in the room, we had them brought up in less then 5 min. if that. Later I felt our a/c was to cold and the gentlemen was at our room withing 2 mins. Talk about great service!! Our room was very clean it had an ocean and pool view with a kitchen. The beds are new with the deep matress very very comfortable. Staff always have a smile on their face they always greet you comming or going they make you feel like you are part of the family not just a guest. Even the cleaning staff have smiles and are very helpfull. The pool area is very clean with lots of chairs for everyone there are two fire pits to enjoy your evenings the hot tub is clean and hot. Malissa is the person that ensures the kids and guess have fun. She is great with the kids games. Pool bingo was great my 2 kids always looked forward to the 11:00 am bingo and the prizes. They have beach walks, shell digging, trivia games, and lots of other activities. The pool is never over crowded. Oh and they have a great gated kids splash park for the younger kids surounded with chairs so you can still suntan while the kids have fun. During the evening the pool has colour lights that change and it really nice to swim in. They have a singer/guitar player in the evening to enjoy while at the restaurant or in the pool or just sitting arount. They also have a game room the for kids. The food at the restaurant is great and so are the prices. I can go on and on but lets just say I am sorry that I have to leave. We have been here from the 14th and are leaving tomorrow the 18th I'm really going to miss this place and will be back. If you are looking for a clean, friendly, homely feeling hotel this is the place to stay. We all loved it and will be back. During our 2 week stay I have not heard one person say anything wrong about there stay here. But don't take my word for it go and see it for yourself.

Reviews.Title: “very nice”
Reviews.Author: john c
Reviews.Content: My family came down from Chicago and we stayed here with them for a couple of days. It was a very nice experience. kids had a blast. would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Daytona Beach hotel”
Reviews.Author: funlovingcouple157
Reviews.Content: Stayed in Daytona for five days in this great hotel. We found the beach in front to be clean and easy to get to. Our check in/out was quick and painless, especially since we were upgraded to an ocean view room for free. The beds, oh wow, were some of the most comfortable I have ever slept in anywhere!! We also like the fact that there was a parking garage to protect the car from the blazing heat as well as the freak thunderstorms. The only bad thing about the hotel is the $6 resort fee for a hotel that doesn't really meet the definition of a resort, to me. If I come back to this town, I would definitely look at this property first before other locations.

Reviews.Title: “Parking”
Reviews.Author: tennisrebel06
Reviews.Content: I was disappointed with the parking spaces, there are alot of spaces to park but it is very tiny space not really the size needed for such a huge hotel, this hotel needs bigger parking spaces and the parking deck up the ramp is a TIGHT squeeze and only lets one car down at a time, other than that the hotel is amazing and the rooms are outstanding!!

Reviews.Title: “VERY NICE!!”
Reviews.Author: Judy P
Reviews.Content: It's been the nicest Holiday Inn I have stayed at. I had no problems, the rooms were very clean. The view from the balcony in the morning was spectacular. Front desk and maintenance were also very helpful, I stayed on the fourth floor and my swimming shorts accidentally fell over the balcony onto the roof of the bar. I called the front desk and maintenance came to my room 5 minutes later with my swimming shorts. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely a great value for your money.”
Reviews.Author: smitty0731
Reviews.Content: Wonderful pool for kids and adults! Great family resort. Nice patio area with fire pits. Staff was very accommodating. We are planning our next visit.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value on the Beach”
Reviews.Author: Tripwilmington
Reviews.Content: Only stayed one night. Excellent beach and large pool. Room had full size refrigerator, microwave and two electric burners. This would be great to save on meals. The only negative I would say is the food quality at the H2O restaurant. The service at the restaurant was excellent, Nikki, our waitress. A very good value at $128.00 in August.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: Scotty1960
Reviews.Content: Our room was nice and very clean,we had a balcony which was nice for beach and sunrise viewing.. This place was an overall A+ for us and the price was very nice also. We did not use the pool,bar or restaurant but lots of folks did.

Reviews.Title: “GOOD VALUE”
Reviews.Author: travelingritz
Reviews.Content: for the price it was good. OCEAN view and was like a small apartment studio. Was clean the only bad thing wad the pillow, it was hard. The room had a big t.v and the dining room had another t.v, it was big. I LIKED IT WILL RECOMEND FOR PRICE.

Reviews.Title: “Modern, Clean, and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: OakhurstFamily
Reviews.Content: We has a reservation at a different hotel and ended up changing to the Holiday Inn Resort because the lobby alone was so much more inviting. The hotel had wonderful staff and amenities. At $120+ a night, they certainly make you pay for the accomodations, but kids eat free and there are free activities to enjoy. The pool and restaurant were great.

Reviews.Title: “Little Things Mean a Lot”
Reviews.Author: Boomerizon
Reviews.Content: This property has recently undergone a multi-million dollar renovation. New rooms feature complimentary high speed wireless internet, refrigerators, microwaves and flat panel TVs. Our bathroom has one sink mounted in granite, plus a tub with an adjustable shower head. Beds are comfortable and offer four pillows - two soft and two firm. Air conditioning in our room works great. We have no couch or seating area in our room, just a small square table with two chairs for dining. Internet access codes change every Saturday at midnight. I'm using a wired connection, which so far, has been reliable. Desk chair is fully adjustable. Lamp lighting is good and has two outlets, as does the lamp between beds. The hotel has no beach chairs or umbrellas of their own, except by the pool. Chairs and umbrellas are available from private contractors for $30 a day. Hotel room windows face east to the beach. The balcony of our room has two chairs and a small table. Unfortunately, the combination of afternoon temperatures, plus heat rising from the parking lot and the exhaust from the room air conditioner makes the area intolerable until after sunset. Although the web site lists "full kitchen," our room does not have an oven. Silverware (which should probably be a set of four) includes only one place knife, three teaspoons and four place forks. Kitchen cutlery includes only one plastic pasta server, one serving spoon and one flat spatula. No knives. Directly behind us is a parking lot between the building and the beach - a detail that's significantly missing from the web site's "view from the hotel" photo. The fitness center comprises one recumbent bike, one elliptical machine and two treadmills. Towels are complimentary, but germicidal spray or wipes are not provided. Bring your own. Vending machines are on odd floors only. Today, the one on Level 1 is out of order, as is one of two guest washing machines on our floor. Washing or drying is $2 per load. A in-room hotel directory of services and general information would be helpful. None is provided. Hotel staff is friendly enough, but has not been trained in simple courtesies like greeting guests, not talking shop in the presence of guests and letting guests exit elevators first.

Reviews.Title: “VERY NICE AND CLEAN HOTEL BUT (((POOR SERVICE)))”
Reviews.Author: RickyScott
Reviews.Content: My ordeal started the day i checked in when they overcharged me for the room and cleaned out my checking account. I had paid cash for the room and they said we need a credit card for incidentals i said okay, then the next day i went to get breakfast at a popular fast food chain and give the lady the card and she promptly come back and says "your card is declined" WTF i had $1000 saved for my vacation. When i got back to the hotel get on phone with the bank they say you are over drafted on you account "um how?" the nice guy at the front desk neglected to tell me that he swiped the hole hotel stay on my card and then refunded it right back too late it takes the bank up to 5 days for them to re credit the money . So I went down to the front desk and confronted them after a hour of explanation they said we can help you fix it. I said can i have a small refund on my stay in cash so i can get breakfast for me and my family, The lady at the front desk said go eat at the hotel restaurant and charge it your room, not really what i wanted but okay. We proceed to order our food and notice the prices where a little high and 18% gratuity for what no service bulls#**T. So after $42 meal (for 2 adults and 1 four year old) we check an they have fixed the problem thank god. Nope spoke to soon this happened again 2 days later so frustrating spending most of our vacation trying to fix someones else problem . To top it off i get called a 10:00 my 4 day there and the lady at the front desk say you need to pay for you charge at the restaurant because you cant charge food to your room , we were out enjoying our one week a year vacation that i saved for all year long for. You need to get here before 10:30 or she she says "or what?" she wouldn't tell me but she ensued the police would be called. We had just been sat down after a 2 1/2 hour wait at a popular restaurant when we got this call so we had to leave. I feel like my family vacation was a bust thanks to this Holiday Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Had the most wonderful stay will definetly be back !”
Reviews.Author: whiskers011
Reviews.Content: We are an English family & love to visit the USA for our summer holidays. We stayed at the Holiday Inn Resort Daytona Beach. What a fabulous hotel ! the rooms are spaceous decorated so nicely & the cleanliness is superb. The restuarant was very nice & the food so enjoyable & presented very well. The staff at this hotel were friendly helpful & nothing was ever to much trouble. The whole running of this hotel was excellent & made our stay special. Cant wait to visit & stay again !

Reviews.Title: “Great experience and we'll go back”
Reviews.Author: jenntony11
Reviews.Content: My family had a great time. THe staff was wonderful and room was great. It was very clean. I would highly recommend this resort.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel experience”
Reviews.Author: Monica34615
Reviews.Content: The accommodations and the staff were exceptional. Every staff member that we came in contact with was extremely courteous and helpful. They had activities pool side (bingo, scavenger hunt, trivia, etc...) which the kids loved. Close proximity to other Daytona amusements, shopping, and restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Picture perfect!”
Reviews.Author: Scorpio70Montreal
Reviews.Content: We stayed 5 nights and loved the place. The rooms are beautiful. Outside bar, terrace and pool are great! Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: “One of the best!”
Reviews.Author: Esamps
Reviews.Content: My son and I took a trip to see the last shuttle launch. We arrived rather late and ended up with a first floor room with a patio that opened onto a parking lot. The consolation was a cooktop, fridge and microwave. We stayed in this room (although we could move later in our stay) but chose not to. We were able to walk down the corridor, turn left and walk across the pool to reach the beach. With a 16 yr old boy in tow, the kitchenette was a good deal. The pool and pool deck were neat, with two fire pits, a nice pool. The restaurant and bar were good too. Overall, a great stay!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding!”
Reviews.Author: PCMR
Reviews.Content: My children and I stayed in an oceanfront room with a kitchen. The view was fabulous. The room was exceptionally clean when we arrived. The towels had even been folded into swans and placed on the beds. That is a little touch we have only seen on cruises! Our room was maintained with that high level of cleanliness throughout our stay. A huge thank you to the person responsible for cleaning room 619 on July 6-9! The pools were lovely and the atmosphere was very family friendly. We had an amazing stay and hope to come back again. Thank you Holiday Inn Oceanfront Resort for providing us with a family oriented hotel with exceptional rooms and service!

Reviews.Title: “Great weekend getaway”
Reviews.Author: beacher52
Reviews.Content: Upon checking in we were greeted by a very friendly employee named Steve. Being new Priorty Members we were informed that we had been upgraded to an Oceanfront with a full kitchen and we were offered a later checkout time of 2:00 instead of the regular 11:00. The later checkout time was wonderful. We enjoyed being able to spend extra time on our last day. Also, we avoided the busy lobby area of everyone trying to checkout at 11:00. The room was nice, very clean and the view was awesome. Friday evening we enjoyed the pool and bar area with a nice drink and music. Not a loud band but a man playing mostly Jimmy Buffet etc. We had breakfast in the H2O Resturaunt. Very good and reasonably priced. Overall we had a wonderful time. The only complaint was the airconditioner didn't keep the room real cool when you had the curtain open to the balcony. The elevator was a little slow also. Those were really only minor things compared to all the really nice qualities. We definately will stay again. Already hoping to go back Labor Day weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: Southernkygal
Reviews.Content: We came to Daytona Beach with no reservations for any certain hotel. A friend had recently stayed at this Holiday Inn and suggested that we do the same. We sure are glad we did! We were promptly greeted by Steve (super nice guy) at the front desk who showed us a room at my request. It was a very pleasant double oceanfront room with kitchen. At the time we were only hoping to get a standard oceanfront - no kitchen (because of price difference). I questioned him about the rate of the room and he said not to worry - with our Priority Club card we were eligible for an upgrade at no charge. How nice! We checked in immediately. Our room was on the 6th floor with a great ocean and pool view. Beds were comfy and room was clean and fresh - as if it was a brand new hotel. We loved the pool! It starts shallow and goes all the way past 10 ft deep with a cute waterfall on the deep side. There is a kids area (splash pad) with a gate and lots of chairs for sunbathing. We also enjoyed the fire pits that were lit after dark. It was nice to sit back and roast some marshmallows after a day on the beach. The on site restaurant makes some great cocktails! When we checked in we were given a coupon for 2 free cocktails - a nice bonus :) and used them the first night of the stay. Overall this was a great stay! No complaints at all here. Cant wait to return to Daytona Beach - we will for sure be staying at the Holiday Inn Oceanfront again!

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleasant rooms!”
Reviews.Author: sail3200
Reviews.Content: As a professional meeting planner I can tell you that this property has completed a very nice remodel job. Room decor is very tastefully done and the pool deck area is one of the best on the beach. I was there over a weekend period, but had no problem finding a parking space. Some guests I ran into did not realize there are actually 3 different parking area's at the hotel. As other Holiday Innn's try to improve their image, they would do well taking a close look at this property.

Reviews.Title: “Overall satisfied, but many improvements needed!”
Reviews.Author: martin123444
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the Holiday Inn Daytona resort after having some trouble with the Best Western Aku Tiki Inn down the street. The hotel and rooms were very clean, no problems in that aspect. We were also given a room with a very nice ocean and pool view, which was very nice as well. Also, the restaurant in the hotel is very good for a really good price. I was, however, dissatisfied by a few aspects of this hotel. First, I found the staff of the front desk quite rude, especially when we checked in. Also, we were woken up at 5am for a wake up call that was not for our room. On top of that, the gentlemen did not even bother to appologize over the phone, even though he had woken us up while we were on vacation! Also, the laundry facilities were out of order for both times we tried to use them. In addition, the parking lot is very poorly designed, making it difficult to park for any medium sized cars. Finally, I am not sure whether or not the hotel allows solicitations, but we must have accumulated well over 50 advertisement panflets through our door in the span of a week. Bottom line: Very clean facilities, but poor service

Reviews.Title: “GREAT QUALITY FOR AN AMAZING PRICE”
Reviews.Author: mandi_09
Reviews.Content: My friends and I checked into this hotel after having some problems with the Best Western Aku Tiki Inn down the street. Overall we were very pleased with out stay here! We were offered a great price per night during our 7 night stay in Daytona. The rooms were extremely clean and our room had a kitchenette, fridge and freezer with pots and pans and other utensils. We had an amazing view of the ocean and pool and beach in front of the hotel was very clean and enjoyable. If I would change one thing it would be the service. The men were very kind and helpful but the women I found to be very rude and incompetent. We were also woken up during the night for a wake up call that we didn`t ask for because they had gotten the room number wrong. Also we had rented a car and on our last day in daytona we noticed it had a dent near the driver`s door. The parking lot is very tight and there aren`t enough parking spaces. With exception of these few quirks, we had a great time and would definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay and already planning another getaway there”
Reviews.Author: Kah0003
Reviews.Content: Everything about the hotel was fabulous. All remodeled, great view from the room, great pool, nice relaxing evening and view from outside the room, great beds. All I have to say is fabulous vacation and we are already planning another trip in august! If I could change anything it would be the crowdedness of the parking garage, but that wasn't a deal breaker for us!

Reviews.Title: “WOW- Great overall experience”
Reviews.Author: Glamdent
Reviews.Content: I don't usually associate the Holiday Inn with top tier quality and service, but this was definitely up there! This location was recently remodeled and the result is a clean, modern look with excellent service thrown in. My 16 month old loved the kiddie pool and my husband and I loved the ocean view balcony and the fact that it is right on the beach. Everyone who worked there was very friendly and helpful. Very family friendly. I will definitely be back!

Reviews.Title: “I loved it GREAT place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Adrian_Ga_Kelly
Reviews.Content: Me and my husband went for our 15th anniversary June 8th through June 12th. We loved it. This resort is great for family or couples. Check in was great we got there late around 11:30 pm and Rolando was waiting for us we where his last check ins for the night very very friendly thank you Rolando for your help. The room we had was great and wonderful ocean front view. The whole hotel has been remodeled. The pool and hot tube was very nice and they have games out by the pool deck for everyone. The lady that was there doing the games is very nice and friendly. Yes will be be returning back to Holiday Inn Resort Daytona Beach. Very Very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay in Daytona Beach”
Reviews.Author: Charlie3446
Reviews.Content: This hotel has been recently renovated and the rooms are very nice and new. I used priority club points and never know exactly what to expect but the hotel upgraded us to a beachfront room with a full kitchen due to my member status which was really nice. The room had a fill sized refridgerator and stove. The beach was right out the door past the pool and the hot tub whixh were both in great shape. There is also a fire pit at the pool that they keep burning at night. The front desk staff were great and went above and beyond to make us feel welcome. I only used the restaurant for coffee and a drink so I can't comment on the food. Overall it was a relaxing stay and I would definitely spend a couple of days here again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value - the revamped Holiday Inn!”
Reviews.Author: RONALDB62
Reviews.Content: We arrived 5 June not knowing what to expect but was pleasantly surprised to find the hotel had been wonderfully renovated got the last two years and was completely finished by the time of our arrival, for a beach hotel a definite 4 stars!!

Reviews.Title: “it doesn't get any better than this”
Reviews.Author: lamboguy1
Reviews.Content: We had the opportunity to spend last weekend at this hotel/resort. I have stayed in many four and five star hotels throughout the world and it was had to believe this is a Holiday inn. The rooms, staff, amenities were as good as any beach resort In which I have ever stayed. Every room has an ocean view which is spectacular and the pool bar and restaurant are first class in every respect. The owners have done a marvelous job of remodeling the hotel and they have brought Holiday in to a new level of excellence. We will certainly be back to this hotel in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, Excellent, Excellent”
Reviews.Author: vinyloddisee
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed everything about this hotel. Staff very nice, Restaurant - ate the best Mahi Mahi ever, kept kitchen open late for us. rooms great with nice big balcony, pool great sized and very convenient to beach.

Reviews.Title: “We certainly be returning”
Reviews.Author: jlee73024
Reviews.Content: This hotel was absolutley beautiful. We will be returning to this hotel. It was beautifully redone and the staff was wonderful. Every couple of hours they had activities to keep the kids entertained. I actually got to see my 2 girls work together(rare sight) on a scavenger hunt. Food was really good and kids are free to eat. Great job Holiday Inn. My only downside was the price. We are locals who are just looking to get away for a night and price was a bit steep.

Reviews.Title: “memorable weekend”
Reviews.Author: naj4evr
Reviews.Content: we took our guest from africa and united kingdom for a weekend stay at the hotel. We had a wonderful time during our short stay at the holiday inn. everything was just perfect , from the suite rooms with the ocean view, the friendly staff, the cleanliness, the yummy food, everything about this hotel was breathtaking. Watching the sunset and the sunrise from the balcony was magical. We will strongly recommend this hotel as the best of the best to our family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “One Memorable Weekend!”
Reviews.Author: Zjanmohamed
Reviews.Content: We had a very nice time at our stay at Holiday Inn. I had my kids with me and they had a blast. The atmosphere was just too good; the place is child friendly, the staff were very pleasant and helpful. The restaurant was a nice place to sit together and enjoy meals or a nice cup of coffee. With the beach view at your disposal it was just heaven! The rooms were too good of course. Every small detail had been taken care of to satisfy the needs of the customer. The beds were very comfortable and spacious to enjoy a good night's rest. I would definitely come again. I personally liked the suite rooms because they had a mini kitchen so its ideal for families.

Reviews.Title: “The location is amazing and the service was great... The hotel is modern and clean ..”
Reviews.Author: Ingridcc
Reviews.Content: I recommend this hotel for family or Single people ... I am single and went with family and at the beach met alot of single people that made my get away even better... Great location ....

Reviews.Title: “The new Daytina Beach!!”
Reviews.Author: pats9090
Reviews.Content: I am writing this review sitting poolside at this incredible resort. I have stayed here a couple times before in the past, and it was a typical oceanfront property. Well, what a surprose now, it seems like a brand new place. The rooms are very nicely appointed, bar and restaurant are poolside and wonderful, and the staff are kind and inviting. If you are considering Daytona Beach for an upcoming vacation you will love the new Holiday Inn Resort.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Vacation Destination.”
Reviews.Author: go2agym1
Reviews.Content: Me my wife, daughter and grandson stayed in the King Suite with a pull out sofa in room 701 7th floor. Went through the room thoroughly and found it to be clean, no bugs and ready for guests. The view from our balcony of the Ocean was spectacular as always, I like that they have removed the carpet and put in all new ceramic tile, also I like the new granite counter tops and new appliances. The rooms were controlled by a digital thermostat on the wall so you didn't have to play with the turn knobs on the Air conditioners. I really didn't get time to play at the fitness room or game room or eat at the dining room, but they are really nice but more could be added to the fitness room as in some weights. The change at the pool for the kids was a good thing as the kids now feel it is for them and its shallow enough for infants. The regular poolside was great as now they have plenty of activities for all ages by the pool. (Scavenger hunts, bingo, etc.) I also noticed that the entrance now is smaller but its only because they have added a room for selling snacks, sunscreens, and etc. The elevators are much cleaner than before. Overall I think they have done a great job and would recommend this hotel to all my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely!”
Reviews.Author: TheTravellingKimmie
Reviews.Content: We stayed here the 2nd week of April. We had fabulous weather and really lucked out with this hotel. Not only was our room beautiful and looked to be newly renovated but the ocean view - breathtaking! Waking in the morning watching the sunrise over the ocean from your balcony was simply magical. The restaurant and bar opens up to a relaxing outdoor patio area that over looks the pool/with mini waterfall. There was a hot tub. They also have these cool fire pits...at night we got a drink and sat by the fire. The hotel staff is really stellar - they're friendly & helpful. We had a few glitches but they made things right. We had stopped here because we were so tired and had been driving for two days to get to Florida. Our plan was to stay one night and then head over to the Gulf Coast but we loved this place so much we stayed the week. Something else I notice...the sweet scent in the air...I don't know what it was but it smelled good! Maybe orange blossoms?

Reviews.Title: “Fun in the Sun”
Reviews.Author: SallieM
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Holiday Inn Resort in Daytona Beach during the weekend of April 15th to the 18th. It is a beautiful hotel..staff are pleasant & accommodating. The rooms are very nice, we had a mini kitchen, the bathroom is large with a great shower, everything is spotless. Great pool, restaurant/bar. Fantastic view of the Atlantic Ocean. All the rooms are smoke free as is the hotel. Maid service was excellent, especially Jasmine (she told me she was from Turkey)..very nice, hard working, young woman. I would definitely recommend this hotel, you will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “5 Million Plus Renovation and WOW! Holiday Inn Resort Resort is the Place on the Beach”
Reviews.Author: TheHopperFamily
Reviews.Content: My Kids were on Spring Break week, so we decided to go to Daytona Beach for a couple Nights. Now my Wife and I are Platnum Priority Club Members and we stay on Points when on Leisure time like this two night Trip. So I surfed the Priority Club Rewards nights and this hotel was one of the options for Daytona Beach that we could use our reward points to stay. The Reviews I read kinda Scared me so I called the Front Desk and the reception person explained that they just completed the 5 million Plus Renovation so I said OK we are in. When we checked in there was a ribbon cutting going on with the Daytona Chamber of Commerce so "Ching Ching" Free Appetizers and Beer and Wine! We got upgraded as we are platinum status so we had a nice suite with the Kids had there own little Room with Bunk Beds and a TV! The Kids Director was so Fantastic and always remembered each childs name during the Poolside games, Amazing actually. I wish I could remember her name! Sorry... Kids Director you were great. She had little prizes for all the kids and kept them entertained very well. The Beach in front is Awesome with Lots of Beach Sand between the Hotel and the Ocean. The Moom over the Ocean was amazing in the Evenings. If you have little kids take them to Daytona Lagoon, we actually got there late and just did the Arcade and Pizza and They had a blast. The Holiday Inn Resort is All New, Beds, Pillows, Bathroom Towels and everything was Top notch. The other Perk is Kids eat free at Holiday Inns, so up to two kids eat free with one adult! and the Bar Restaurant had an inside/outside Seating Option. The Fireside pits were lit in the Evenings and instantly became a gathering place for the adults, we met nice friends and even one of the Owners came and set and chatted a bit! I'm attaching a few photos of the Holiday Inn Resort Daytona Beach for your viewing pleasure. I Highly Recommend this Hotel for your next Daytona Beach Stay. You will simply be blown away. The Hopper Family

Reviews.Title: “Sooo relaxing!!”
Reviews.Author: Catawbakel
Reviews.Content: What a nice experience!!! All of the staff was very friendly especially Melissa, activities coordinator who conducted games by the pool and Veda, bartender at the hotel restaurant. The food was excellent at the restaurant...try the coconut shrimp with mango salsa. Pool was gorgeous and I enjoyed the fire pits at night. I will def return and had a great experience!! :)

Reviews.Title: “WOW”
Reviews.Author: Bberg032
Reviews.Content: Ok, so after reading some of the reviews I was expecting the worst. All I can say is WOW. It's obvious that they spent a lot of money on the renovations. The rooms are clean, the kitchen rooms are very useful if you are traveling with a family and dont want to eat out every meal. The view form the rooms is fantastic. WE loved the pool deck. The kids had fun in the splash park, my wife and i enjoyed drinks around the gas fire place at night. Very romantic. Finally the staff are superb, they actually remember your name.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to stay here again”
Reviews.Author: KYKIWI
Reviews.Content: This is a beautiful property. The rooms were great. Everything is remodeled & modern. The pool deck is wonderful. There is a kid pool with splash areas. The main pool is nice with a waterfall fountain. There is one hot tub. My favorite was the two gas fire pits on the pool deck. We ordered dinner & breakfast on the pool deck. The staff was super friendly. Kids eat free. Only thing that could be better is the elevator. It is slow. But I'm sure this property is older. Not a deal breaker for me. I will stay here again when I need a get away.

Reviews.Title: “Wish we could have stayed longer”
Reviews.Author: Nucknfuts
Reviews.Content: Clean, quiet - even during bike week, solid doors, beautiful view, your own deck overlooking the ocean, full size fridge, kitchenette, SUPER comfy beds. I can't say enough good things about this place and staff. Many bad reviewers stayed during construction, but as of March 2011 all construction is done and they spent a lot of money on it. We sat by one of the two fire rings by the pool, soaked in the hot tub, swam in the ocean and swam in the pool. Met nice spring break kids and a nice couple who were also there for bike week. I would have expected to pay $100 more for rooms like this. We paid $129 mid week as walk ins.

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING EXPERIENCE!!!”
Reviews.Author: lisa1109
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel with family and friends and we had a great time. The staff was able to get us room together and we could go between rooms easily. The hotel looks excellent. Not sure what it looked like before the renovations. The kiddy pool is great. I love the easy access to the beach. But the best part is the view from all the rooms we had. An amazing sunrise over the ocean. Thank you to the staff for making my family stay perfect!!! :-)

Reviews.Title: “Had a great time!”
Reviews.Author: giga1023
Reviews.Content: Stayed for three nights. Room and pool was great and we would definitely stay again. Elevator was slow and there were multi pizza ads slipped under our door. Didn't bother us, had a great time!

HotelInfo.Name: Holiday Inn Resort Daytona Beach Oceanfront
HotelInfo.Address: 1615 S Atlantic Ave, Daytona Beach, FL 32118 (Formerly Inn on the Beach)
